actually	O	O
super()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
is	O	O
not	O	O

a	O	O

.	O	O

to	O	O

super()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
when	O	O

to	O	O

a	O	O

method	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O

ca	O	O

(	O	O

Example	O	O

a	O	O

,	O	O

a	O	O

,	O	O

I	O	O
just	O	O

that	O	O

actually	O	O

)	O	O

My	O	O
answer	O	O
is	O	O
still	O	O
valid	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
regarding	O	O
your	O	O
specific	O	O
scenario	O	O
:	O	O

you	O	O
should	O	O
use	O	O
self.test_a()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
unless	O	O
you	O	O
override/overwrite	O	O
that	O	O
method	O	O
in	O	O
your	O	O
class	O	O
B	O	B-Class
and	O	O
you	O	O
want	O	O
to	O	O
execute	O	O
the	O	O
original	O	O
implementation.	O	O
.	O	O
so	O	O
we	O	O
can	O	O
say	O	O
that	O	O
calling	O	O
super().test_a()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
or	O	O
self.test_a()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
it	O	O
's	O	O
the	O	O
same	O	O
given	O	O
that	O	O
you	O	O
'll	O	O
never	O	O
override/overwrite	O	O
the	O	O
original	O	O
test_a()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
in	O	O
your	O	O
subclasses.	O	O
.	O	O
however	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
nonsense	O	O
to	O	O
use	O	O
super()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
if	O	O
not	O	O
for	O	O
an	O	O

Usually	O	O
you	O	O
will	O	O

to	O	O

to	O	O

an	O	O

.	O	O

However	O	O

some	O	O

might	O	O
want	O	O

even	O	O
though	O	O
it	O	O
seems	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
the	O	O
same	O	O
thing	O	O
.	O	O

They	O	O
're	O	O
not	O	O
equivalent	O	O
,	O	O
even	O	O
though	O	O
they	O	O
have	O	O
the	O	O
same	O	O
behavior	O	O
in	O	O
your	O	O
example	O	O
.	O	O

explore	O	O

differences	O	O
,	O	O
lets	O	O
make	O	O
two	O	O
versions	O	O
of	O	O
your	O	O
B	B-Code_Block	B-Class
class	O	O
,	O	O
one	O	O
with	O	O
each	O	O
kind	O	O
of	O	O
call	O	O
,	O	O
then	O	O
make	O	O
two	O	O
C	B-Code_Block	B-Class
classes	O	O
that	O	O
further	O	O
extend	O	O
the	O	O
B	B-Code_Block	B-Class
classes	O	O
and	O	O
override	O	O
test_a	B-Code_Block	B-Function
:	O	O

When	O	O
you	O	O
call	O	O
the	O	O
test_b()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
method	O	O
on	O	O
C1	B-Code_Block	B-Class
and	O	O
C2	B-Code_Block	B-Class
instances	O	O

different	O	O

even	O	O

and	O	O

behave	O	O
the	O	O

This	O	O
is	O	O
because	O	O
the	O	O
super()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
call	O	O
in	O	O

tells	O	O
Python	O	B-Language
that	O	O
you	O	O
want	O	O
to	O	O
skip	O	O

of	O	O
test_a	B-Code_Block	B-Function
in	O	O
any	O	O
more	O	O

and	O	O
always	O	O

an	O	O

a	O	O

.	O	O

(	O	O

.	O	O

means	O	O
that	O	O

time	O	O
using	O	O
self.whatever	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
is	O	O

to	O	O

.	O	O

You	O	O

super	B-Code_Block	B-Function

.	O	O

.	O	O

Here	O	O

:	O	O

How	O	O

,	O	O

to	O	O

?	O	O

.	O	O

Is	O	O

I	O	O

.	O	O

If	O	O
Carinherits	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
from	O	O
NSObject	B-Code_Block	B-Class

You	O	O

.	O	O

Hope	O	O

answers	O	O

.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
been	O	O
using	O	O
haskell	O	B-Language
for	O	O
a	O	O
while	O	O
now	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O

most/some	O	O
of	O	O

concepts	O	O

still	O	O
do	O	O
not	O	O
understand	O	O
,	O	O
what	O	O
exactly	O	O
does	O	O
haskells	O	B-Language
type	O	O
system	O	O
allow	O	O

cannot	O	O
do	O	O
in	O	O
another	O	O
statically	O	O
typed	O	O
language	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
just	O	O

that	O	O
haskells	O	B-Language
type	O	O
system	O	O
is	O	O
better	O	O
in	O	O

compared	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O

in	O	O

,	O	O
C++	O	B-Language
or	O	O
java	O	B-Language
,	O	O

about	O	O

in	O	O

between	O	O
haskell	O	B-Language
and	O	O
other	O	O
statically	O	O

.	O	O

Could	O	O

of	O	O
how	O	O
haskells	O	B-Language
type	O	O
system	O	O

compared	O	O
to	O	O

a	O	O

.	O	O

Examples	O	O

and	O	O
can	O	O
be	O	O

be	O	O
nice	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
Haskell	O	B-Language
type	O	O
system	O	O
has	O	O
a	O	O
number	O	O
of	O	O
features	O	O
which	O	O
all	O	O
exist	O	O
in	O	O
other	O	O
languages	O	O

but	O	O
are	O	O
rarely	O	O
combined	O	O
within	O	O
a	O	O
single	O	O

consistent	O	O
language	O	O
:	O	O

it	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
sound	O	O
,	O	O
static	O	B-Data_Type
type	O	O
system	O	O
,	O	O
meaning	O	O
that	O	O
a	O	O
number	O	O
of	O	O
errors	O	O
are	O	O
guaranteed	O	O
not	O	O
to	O	O
happen	O	O
at	O	O
runtime	O	O
without	O	O

runtime	O	O
type	O	O
checks	O	O
(	O	O
this	O	O
is	O	O
also	O	O
the	O	O
case	O	O
in	O	O
Caml	O	B-Language
,	O	O
SML	O	B-Language
and	O	O
almost	O	O
the	O	O

in	O	O
Java	O	B-Language
,	O	O
but	O	O
not	O	O
in	O	O
,	O	O
say	O	O
,	O	O
Lisp	O	B-Language
,	O	O
Python	O	B-Language
,	O	O
C	O	B-Language
,	O	O
or	O	O
C++	O	B-Language
)	O	O
;	O	O

it	O	O
peforms	O	O
static	O	B-Data_Type
type	O	O
reconstruction	O	O
,	O	O
meaning	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
programmer	O	O
does	O	O

need	O	O
to	O	O
write	O	O
types	O	O
unless	O	O
he	O	O
wants	O	O
to	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
compiler	O	B-Application
will	O	O
reconstruct	O	O
them	O	O
on	O	O
its	O	O
own	O	O
(	O	O
this	O	O
is	O	O
also	O	O
the	O	O
case	O	O
in	O	O
Caml	O	B-Language
and	O	O
SML	O	B-Language
,	O	O
but	O	O
not	O	O
in	O	O
Java	O	B-Language
or	O	O
C	O	B-Language
)	O	O
;	O	O

it	O	O
supports	O	O
impredicative	O	O

(	O	O

variables	O	O
)	O	O
,	O	O
even	O	O
at	O	O
higher	O	O
kinds	O	O
(	O	O
unlike	O	O
Caml	O	B-Language
and	O	O
SML	O	B-Language
,	O	O
or	O	O
any	O	O
other	O	O
production-ready	O	O
language	O	O
known	O	O
to	O	O
me	O	O
)	O	O
;	O	O

it	O	O
has	O	O
good	O	O
support	O	O
for	O	O
overloading	O	O
(	O	O
type	O	O
classes	O	O
)	O	O
(	O	O
unlike	O	O
Caml	O	B-Language
and	O	O
SML	O	B-Language
)	O	O
.	O	O

Whether	O	O
any	O	O
of	O	O
those	O	O
make	O	O
Haskell	O	B-Language
a	O	O
better	O	O
language	O	O
is	O	O
open	O	O
to	O	O
discussion	O	O
—	O	O
for	O	O
example	O	O
,	O	O
while	O	O
I	O	O
happen	O	O

like	O	O

know	O	O
quite	O	O
a	O	O

programmers	O	O
who	O	O
strongly	O	O
dislike	O	O

and	O	O

to	O	O

the	O	O
module	O	O
system	O	O
.	O	O

On	O	O
the	O	O
other	O	O
hand	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
Haskell	O	B-Language
type	O	O
system	O	O
lacks	O	O
a	O	O
few	O	O
features	O	O
that	O	O
other	O	O
languages	O	O
support	O	O
elegantly	O	O
:	O	O

it	O	O
has	O	O
no	O	O
support	O	O
for	O	O
runtime	O	O
dispatch	O	O
(	O	O
unlike	O	O
Java	O	B-Language
,	O	O
Lisp	O	B-Language
,	O	O
and	O	O
Julia	O	B-Language
)	O	O
;	O	O

it	O	O
has	O	O
no	O	O
support	O	O
for	O	O
existential	O	O
types	O	O
and	O	O
GADTs	O	O
(	O	O
these	O	O
are	O	O
both	O	O
GHC	O	O
extensions	O	O
)	O	O
;	O	O

it	O	O
has	O	O
no	O	O
support	O	O
for	O	O
dependent	O	O
types	O	O
(	O	O
unlike	O	O
Coq	O	B-Language
,	O	O
Agda	O	B-Language
and	O	O
Idris	O	B-Language
)	O	O
.	O	O

Again	O	O
,	O	O
whether	O	O
any	O	O
of	O	O
these	O	O
are	O	O
desirable	O	O
features	O	O
in	O	O
a	O	O
general-purpose	O	O
programming	O	O
language	O	O
is	O	O
open	O	O
to	O	O
discussion	O	O
.	O	O

One	O	O
major	O	O
difference	O	O
between	O	O
Haskell	O	B-Language
's	O	O
type	O	O
system	O	O
and	O	O
that	O	O
of	O	O
most	O	O
OO	O	O
languages	O	O
is	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
ability	O	O
for	O	O
a	O	O
function	O	O
to	O	O
have	O	O
side	O	O
effects	O	O
is	O	O
represented	O	O
by	O	O
a	O	O
data	O	O
type	O	O
(	O	O
a	O	O
monad	O	B-Data_Type
such	O	O
as	O	O
IO	B-Code_Block	B-Data_Type
)	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
allows	O	O
you	O	O
to	O	O
write	O	O
pure	O	O
functions	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
compiler	O	B-Application
can	O	O
verify	O	O
are	O	O
side-effect-free	O	O
and	O	O
referentially	O	O
transparent	O	O
,	O	O
which	O	O
generally	O	O
means	O	O
that	O	O
they	O	O
're	O	O
easier	O	O
to	O	O
understand	O	O
and	O	O
less	O	O
prone	O	O
to	O	O
bugs	O	O
.	O	O

It	O	O
's	O	O
possible	O	O
to	O	O
write	O	O
side-effect-free	O	O
code	O	O
in	O	O
other	O	O
languages	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
you	O	O
do	O	O
n't	O	O
have	O	O
the	O	O
compiler	O	B-Application
's	O	O
help	O	O
in	O	O
doing	O	O
so	O	O
.	O	O

Haskell	O	B-Language
makes	O	O
you	O	O
think	O	O
more	O	O
carefully	O	O
about	O	O
which	O	O
parts	O	O
of	O	O
your	O	O
program	O	O
need	O	O
to	O	O
have	O	O
side	O	O
effects	O	O
(	O	O
such	O	O
as	O	O
I/O	O	B-Data_Type
or	O	O
mutable	O	B-Data_Type
variables	O	O
)	O	O
and	O	O
which	O	O
parts	O	O
should	O	O
be	O	O
pure	O	O
.	O	O

Also	O	O
,	O	O
although	O	O
it	O	O
's	O	O
not	O	O
quite	O	O
part	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
type	O	O
system	O	O
itself	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
fact	O	O
that	O	O
function	O	O
definitions	O	O
in	O	O
Haskell	O	B-Language
are	O	O
expressions	O	O
(	O	O
rather	O	O
than	O	O
lists	O	O
of	O	O
statements	O	O
)	O	O
means	O	O
that	O	O
more	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
code	O	O
is	O	O
subject	O	O
to	O	O
type-checking	O	O
.	O	O

In	O	O
languages	O	O
like	O	O
C++	O	B-Language
and	O	O
Java	O	B-Language
,	O	O
it	O	O
's	O	O
often	O	O
possible	O	O
to	O	O
introduce	O	O
logic	O	O
errors	O	O
by	O	O
writing	O	O
statements	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
wrong	O	O
order	O	O
,	O	O
since	O	O
the	O	O
compiler	O	B-Application
does	O	O
n't	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
way	O	O
to	O	O
determine	O	O
that	O	O
one	O	O
statement	O	O
must	O	O
precede	O	O
another	O	O
.	O	O

For	O	O
example	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
might	O	O
have	O	O
one	O	O
line	O	O
that	O	O
modifies	O	O
an	O	O
object	O	O
's	O	O
state	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
another	O	O
line	O	O
that	O	O
does	O	O
something	O	O
important	O	O
based	O	O
on	O	O
that	O	O
state	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
it	O	O
's	O	O
up	O	O
to	O	O
you	O	O
to	O	O
ensure	O	O
that	O	O
these	O	O
things	O	O
happen	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
correct	O	O
order	O	O
.	O	O

In	O	O
Haskell	O	B-Language
,	O	O
this	O	O
kind	O	O
of	O	O
ordering	O	O
dependency	O	O
tends	O	O
to	O	O
be	O	O
expressed	O	O
through	O	O
function	O	O
composition	O	O
—	O	O
e.g	O	O
.	O	O
f	B-Code_Block	B-Function
(	I-Code_Block	I-Function
g	I-Code_Block	I-Function
x	I-Code_Block	I-Function
)	I-Code_Block	I-Function
means	O	O
that	O	O
g	B-Code_Block	B-Function
must	O	O
run	O	O
first	O	O
—	O	O
and	O	O
the	O	O
compiler	O	B-Application
can	O	O
check	O	O
the	O	O
return	O	O
type	O	O
of	O	O
g	B-Code_Block	B-Function

where	O	O
the	O	O
date	O	O
formats	O	O
are	O	O
the	O	O
same	O	O
but	O	O
the	O	O
number	O	O
format	O	O
is	O	O
'	O	B-Value
0	O	I-Value
,	O	I-Value
00	O	I-Value
'	O	B-Value
.	O	O

Does	O	O
a	O	O
server	O	B-Application
have	O	O
to	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
specific	O	O
culture	O	O
enabled/installed	O	O
?	O	O

Or	O	O
any	O	O
other	O	O
ideas	O	O
to	O	O
check	O	O
?	O	O

Finally	O	O
we	O	O
figured	O	O
out	O	O
the	O	O
problem	O	O
.	O	O

Apparently	O	O
there	O	O
are	O	O
registry	O	O
settings	O	O
for	O	O
the	O	O
culture	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
server	O	B-Application
that	O	O
were	O	O
set	O	O
to	O	O
de-AT	O	B-Value
.	O	O

These	O	O
somehow	O	O
were	O	O
being	O	O
honored	O	O
above	O	O
the	O	O
Web.Config	O	B-File_Name
settings	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
need	O	O
to	O	O
somehow	O	O
extract	O	O
plain	O	O
HTTP	O	O
request	O	O
message	O	O
from	O	O
a	O	O
Request	B-Code_Block	B-Class
object	O	O
in	O	O
Scrapy	O	B-Library
(	O	O
so	O	O
that	O	O
I	O	O
could	O	O
,	O	O
for	O	O
example	O	O
,	O	O
copy/paste	O	O
this	O	O
request	O	O
and	O	O
run	O	O
from	O	O
Burp	O	B-Application
)	O	O
.	O	O

So	O	O
given	O	O
a	O	O
scrapy.http.Request	B-Code_Block	B-Class
object	O	O
,	O	O
I	O	O
would	O	O
like	O	O
to	O	O
get	O	O
the	O	O
corresponding	O	O
request	O	O
message	O	O
,	O	O
such	O	O
as	O	O
e.g	O	O
.	O	O

Clearly	O	O
I	O	O
have	O	O
all	O	O
the	O	O
information	O	O
I	O	O
need	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
Request	B-Code_Block	B-Class
object	O	O
,	O	O
however	O	O
trying	O	O
to	O	O
reconstruct	O	O
the	O	O
message	O	O
manually	O	O
is	O	O
error-prone	O	O
as	O	O
I	O	O
could	O	O
miss	O	O
some	O	O
edge	O	O
cases	O	O
.	O	O

My	O	O
understanding	O	O
is	O	O
that	O	O
Scrapy	O	B-Library
first	O	O
converts	O	O
this	O	O
Request	B-Code_Block	B-Class
into	O	O
Twisted	B-Code_Block	B-Library
object	O	O
,	O	O
which	O	O
then	O	O
writes	O	O
headers	O	O
and	O	O
body	O	O
into	O	O
a	O	O
TCP	O	O
transport	O	O
.	O	O

So	O	O
maybe	O	O
there	O	O
's	O	O
away	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
something	O	O
similar	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
write	O	O
to	O	O
a	O	O
string	O	B-Data_Type
instead	O	O
?	O	O

UPDATE	O	O

I	O	O
could	O	O
use	O	O
the	O	O
following	O	O
code	O	O
to	O	O
get	O	O
HTTP	B-Code_Block	O
1.0	I-Code_Block	B-Version
request	O	O
message	O	O
,	O	O
which	O	O
is	O	O
based	O	O
on	O	O
http.py	B-Code_Block	B-Class
.	O	O

Is	O	O
there	O	O
a	O	O
way	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
something	O	O
similar	O	O
with	O	O
HTTP	B-Code_Block	O
1.1	I-Code_Block	B-Version
requests	O	O
/	O	O
http11.py	B-Code_Block	B-File_Name
,	O	O
which	O	O
is	O	O
what	O	O
's	O	O
actually	O	O
being	O	O
sent	O	O
?	O	O

I	O	O
would	O	O
obviously	O	O
like	O	O
to	O	O
avoid	O	O
duplicating	O	O
code	O	O
from	O	O
Scrapy/Twisted	B-Code_Block	B-Library
frameworks	O	O
as	O	O
much	O	O
as	O	O
possible	O	O
.	O	O

As	O	O
scrapy	O	B-Library
is	O	O
open	O	O
source	O	O
and	O	O
also	O	O
has	O	O
plenty	O	O
of	O	O
extension	O	O
points	O	O
,	O	O
this	O	O
should	O	O
be	O	O
doable	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
requests	O	O
are	O	O
finally	O	O
assembled	O	O
and	O	O
sent	O	O
out	O	O
in	O	O
scrapy/core/downloader/handlers/http11.py	O	B-File_Name
in	O	O
ScrapyAgent.download_request	B-Code_Block	B-Function
(	O	O
https://github.com/scrapy/scrapy/blob/master/scrapy/core/downloader/handlers/http11.py#L270	O	O
)	O	O

If	O	O
you	O	O
place	O	O
your	O	O
hook	O	O
there	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
dump	O	O
the	O	O
request	O	O
type	O	O
,	O	O
request	O	O
headers	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
request	O	O
body	O	O
.	O	O

To	O	O
place	O	O
your	O	O
code	O	O
there	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
either	O	O
try	O	O
monkey	O	O
patching	O	O
ScrapyAgent.download_request	B-Code_Block	B-Function
or	O	O
to	O	O
subclass	O	O
ScrapyAgent	B-Code_Block	B-Class
to	O	O
do	O	O
the	O	O
request	O	O
logging	O	O
,	O	O
then	O	O
subclass	O	O
HTTP11DownloadHandler	B-Code_Block	B-Class
to	O	O
use	O	O
your	O	O
Scrapy	O	B-Library
Agent	O	O
and	O	O
then	O	O
set	O	O
HTTP11DownloadHandler	O	B-Class
as	O	O
new	O	O
DOWNLOAD_HANDLER	O	B-Class
for	O	O
http	O	O
/	O	O
https	O	O
requests	O	O
in	O	O
your	O	O
project	O	O
's	O	O
settings.py	O	B-File_Name
(	O	O
for	O	O
details	O	O
see	O	O
:	O	O
https://doc.scrapy.org/en/latest/topics/settings.html#download-handlers	O	O
)	O	O

In	O	O
my	O	O
opinion	O	O
this	O	O
is	O	O
the	O	O
closest	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
get	O	O
to	O	O
logging	O	O
the	O	O
requests	O	O
going	O	O
out	O	O
without	O	O
using	O	O
a	O	O
packet	O	O
sniffer	O	O
or	O	O
a	O	O
logging	O	O
proxy	O	O
(	O	O
which	O	O
might	O	O
be	O	O
a	O	O
bit	O	O
overkill	O	O
for	O	O
your	O	O
scenario	O	O
)	O	O
.	O	O

From	O	O
the	O	O
documentation	O	O
:	O	O

"	O	O
Assigning	O	O
to	O	O
size	O	O
,	O	O
width	O	O
or	O	O
height	O	O
changes	O	O
the	O	O
dimensions	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
rectangle	O	O
"	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
the	O	O
following	O	O
circle	O	B-User_Interface_Element
,	O	O
assign	O	O
a	O	O
new	O	O
attribute	O	O
but	O	O
no	O	O
changes	O	O
can	O	O
be	O	O
seen	O	O
in	O	O
circle	O	B-User_Interface_Element
.	O	O

What	O	O
am	O	O
i	O	O
doing	O	O
wrong	O	O
?	O	O

You	O	O
draw	O	O
the	O	O
circle	O	B-User_Interface_Element
on	O	O
the	O	O
screen	O	B-User_Interface_Element
surface	O	O
.	O	O

Every	O	O
drawing	O	O
function	O	O
then	O	O
returns	O	O
a	O	O
Rect	B-Code_Block	B-Class
,	O	O
but	O	O
:	O	O

To	O	O
actually	O	O
change	O	O
the	O	O
circle	O	B-User_Interface_Element
on	O	O
the	O	O
screen	O	B-User_Interface_Element
,	O	O
you	O	O
have	O	O
to	O	O
erase	O	O
it	O	O
first	O	O
(	O	O
draw	O	O
something	O	O
above	O	O
it	O	O
)	O	O
,	O	O
then	O	O
draw	O	O
a	O	O
new	O	O
circle	O	B-User_Interface_Element
in	O	O
the	O	O
size	O	O
you	O	O
want	O	O
.	O	O

Here	O	O
's	O	O
a	O	O
simple	O	O
example	O	O
:	O	O

I	O	O
am	O	O
attempting	O	O
to	O	O
up-sample	O	O
an	O	O
icosahedron	O	O
in	O	O
MATLAB	O	B-Application
by	O	O
adding	O	O
new	O	O
vertices	O	O
at	O	O
the	O	O
mid-points	O	O
of	O	O
each	O	O
edge	O	O
and	O	O
recomputing	O	O
the	O	O
faces	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
've	O	O
managed	O	O
to	O	O
place	O	O
the	O	O
new	O	O
vertices	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
I	O	O
ca	O	O
n't	O	O
figure	O	O
out	O	O
how	O	O
to	O	O
recompute	O	O
the	O	O
new	O	O
faces	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
want	O	O
each	O	O
vertex	O	O
to	O	O
connect	O	O
to	O	O
its	O	O
closest	O	O
neighbours	O	O
to	O	O
form	O	O
a	O	O
new	O	O
,	O	O
up-sampled	O	O
icosahedron	O	O
.	O	O

Sample	O	O
data	O	O
:	O	O

Code	O	O
:	O	O

For	O	O
a	O	O
triangle	O	O
{	B-Code_Block	O
1	I-Code_Block	B-Value
,	I-Code_Block	O
2	I-Code_Block	B-Value
,	I-Code_Block	O
3}	I-Code_Block	B-Value
,	O	O
subdividing	O	O
will	O	O
create	O	O
3	O	O
new	O	O
vertices	O	O
{	B-Code_Block	O
a	I-Code_Block	B-Variable
,	I-Code_Block	O
b	I-Code_Block	B-Variable
,	I-Code_Block	O
c}	I-Code_Block	B-Variable
:	O	O

It	O	O
will	O	O
also	O	O
create	O	O
4	O	O
new	O	O
faces	O	O
:	O	O

Your	O	O
code	O	O
creates	O	O
the	O	O
coordinates	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
new	O	O
vertices	O	O
in	O	O
V	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
such	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
a	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
vertices	O	O
for	O	O
all	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
triangles	O	O
come	O	O
first	O	O
,	O	O
followed	O	O
by	O	O
the	O	O
c	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
vertices	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
then	O	O
the	O	O
b	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
vertices	O	O
.	O	O

First	O	O
let	O	O
's	O	O
generate	O	O
the	O	O
indices	O	O
of	O	O
these	O	O
vertices	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
new	O	O
indices	O	O
start	O	O
from	O	O
size(S.vertices)+1	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
and	O	O
there	O	O
are	O	O
a	O	O
total	O	O
of	O	O
3*size(S.faces)	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
of	O	O
them	O	O
.	O	O

Let	O	O
's	O	O
also	O	O
group	O	O
the	O	O
new	O	O
vertices	O	O
for	O	O
a	O	O
each	O	O
existing	O	O
face	O	O
together	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
gives	O	O
us	O	O
all	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
new	O	O
[	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
a	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
b	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
c	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
]	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
faces	O	O
(	O	O
actually	O	O
,	O	O
in	O	O
[	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
a	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
c	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
b	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
]	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
order	O	O
)	O	O
in	O	O
Vx(f,:)	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
with	O	O
the	O	O
a	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
vertices	O	O
in	O	O
Vx(:,1)	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
,	O	O
the	O	O
b	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
vertices	O	O
in	O	O
Vx(:,3)<-	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
-	O	O
not	O	O
2	O	B-Value
!	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
the	O	O
c	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
vertices	O	O
in	O	O
Vx(:,2)	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
.	O	O

Now	O	O
we	O	O
need	O	O
to	O	O
create	O	O
the	O	O
other	O	O
3	O	O
new	O	O
faces	O	O
for	O	O
each	O	O
existing	O	O
face	O	O
.	O	O

You	O	O
can	O	O
do	O	O
this	O	O
using	O	O
cat	B-Code_Block	B-Function
,	O	O
permute	B-Code_Block	B-Function
and	O	O
reshape	B-Code_Block	B-Function
,	O	O
but	O	O
it	O	O
gets	O	O
really	O	O
ugly	O	O
and	O	O
incomprehensible	O	O
.	O	O

Since	O	O
we	O	O
've	O	O
only	O	O
got	O	O
9	O	O
vertices	O	O
that	O	O
go	O	O
into	O	O
these	O	O
faces	O	O
,	O	O
it	O	O
's	O	O
easier	O	O
to	O	O
just	O	O
plug	O	O
them	O	O
in	O	O
manually	O	O
to	O	O
create	O	O
a	O	O
m	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
x	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
9	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
matrix	O	B-Data_Structure
and	O	O
then	O	O
reshape	O	B-Function
into	O	O
m*3	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
x	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
3	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
:	O	O

Now	O	O
all	O	O
that	O	O
's	O	O
left	O	O
is	O	O
updating	O	O
S	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
:	O	O

So	O	O
at	O	O
this	O	O
point	O	O
I	O	O
am	O	O
running	O	O
the	O	O
app	O	O
by	O	O
the	O	O
command	O	O
:	O	O
nodemon	O	B-Code_Block
server.js	O	I-Code_Block
,	O	O
I	O	O
did	O	O
not	O	O
deploy	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
created	O	O
a	O	O
Bitnami	O	B-Library
powered	O	O
compute	O	B-Device
engine	O	I-Device
machine	O	O
that	O	O
has	O	O
MongoDB	O	B-Application
installed	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
it	O	O
works	O	O
when	O	O
I	O	O
log	O	O
in	O	O
to	O	O
it	O	O
.	O	O

From	O	O
my	O	O
nodejs	O	B-Application
App	O	O
engine	O	O
I	O	O
connect	O	O
like	O	O
this	O	O
:	O	O

The	O	O
error	O	O
I	O	O
get	O	O
is	O	O
:	O	O

I	O	O
tried	O	O
ssh-ing	O	O
into	O	O
the	O	O
compute	O	B-Device
engine	O	I-Device
and	O	O
I	O	O
did	O	O
the	O	O
following	O	O
:	O	O

adding	O	O
perimision	O	O
for	O	O
port	O	B-Device
27017	O	O
:	O	O

gcloud	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
compute	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
firewall-rules	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
create	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
allow-mongodb	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
--allow	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
tcp:27017	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block

It	O	O
said	O	O
it	O	O
already	O	O
exist	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
changed	O	O
in	O	O
mongodb.config	O	B-File_Name
in	O	O
bind_ip	O	B-Variable
to	O	O
0.0.0.0	O	B-Value
.	O	O

Still	O	O
nothing	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
is	O	O
very	O	O
frustating	O	O
,	O	O
if	O	O
you	O	O
have	O	O
any	O	O
idea	O	O
I	O	O
would	O	O
very	O	O
much	O	O
apreciate	O	O
it	O	O
.	O	O

As	O	O
a	O	O
mention	O	O
,	O	O
I	O	O
do	O	O
not	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
lot	O	O
of	O	O
experience	O	O
with	O	O
this	O	O
,	O	O
so	O	O
please	O	O
be	O	O
explicit	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
usually	O	O
do	O	O
this	O	O
:	O	O

I	O	O
hope	O	O
helped	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
need	O	O
to	O	O
create	O	O
a	O	O
virtual	O	B-Application
printer	O	I-Application
that	O	O
'	O	O
shreds	O	O
'	O	O

Basically	O	O
here	O	O
is	O	O
my	O	O
problem	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
software	O	O
program	O	O
that	O	O
needs	O	O
to	O	O
'	O	O
print	O	O
'	O	O
a	O	O
file	O	O
before	O	O
it	O	O
will	O	O
save	O	O
it	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
want	O	O
to	O	O
be	O	O
able	O	O
to	O	O
print	O	O
to	O	O
my	O	O
shredder	O	O
so	O	O
that	O	O
it	O	O
saves	O	O
the	O	O
document	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
I	O	O
do	O	O
n't	O	O
actually	O	O
want	O	O
the	O	O
document	O	O
printed	O	O
.	O	O

So	O	O
I	O	O
need	O	O
to	O	O
print	O	O
to	O	O
a	O	O
program	O	O
that	O	O
securely	O	O
deletes	O	O
the	O	O
document	O	O
and	O	O
shows	O	O
as	O	O
a	O	O
driver	O	B-Application
in	O	O

.	O	O

The	O	O
general	O	O

an	O	O

type	O	O
Attached	B-Code_Block	O
Property	I-Code_Block	O
for	O	O

that	O	O

to	O	O

.	O	O

The	O	O
basic	O	O
idea	O	O
is	O	O
this.	O	O
.	O	O
add	O	O
an	O	O
ICommand	B-Code_Block	B-Class

with	O	O
a	O	O

handler	O	O
.	O	O

In	O	O
this	O	O
handler	O	O
(	O	O
which	O	O
will	O	O
be	O	O

when	O	O
an	O	O

is	O	O

to	O	O
this	O	O
property	O	O

a	O	O

to	O	O
the	O	O
event	O	O

.	O	O

the	O	O

.	O	O

.	O	O

must	O	O
do	O	O
the	O	O
following	O	O
:	O	O

that	O	O

this	O	O
routine	O	O
"	O	B-Value
trade	O	I-Value
"	O	I-Value
tids	O	B-Variable
.	O	O

a	O	O
thread	O	O

calls	O	O

is	O	O

this	O	O
means	O	O
that	O	O

about	O	O

?	O	O

Caching	O	O
System.Drawing	O	B-Class
objects	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
mistake	O	O
.	O	O

They	O	O
are	O	O
very	O	O
cheap	O	O
to	O	O
create	O	O
,	O	O
very	O	O
expensive	O	O
to	O	O
keep	O	O
around	O	O
.	O	O

They	O	O
are	O	O
allocated	O	O
on	O	O
a	O	O
special	O	O
heap	O	B-Data_Structure
that	O	O
all	O	O
processes	O	O
on	O	O
a	O	O
desktop	O	B-Device
need	O	O
to	O	O
share	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
heap	O	B-Data_Structure
size	O	O
is	O	O
limited	O	O
to	O	O
65535	O	O
objects	O	O
.	O	O

Creating	O	O
objects	O	O
like	O	O
a	O	O
brush	O	B-Class
or	O	O
a	O	O
pen	O	B-Class
takes	O	O
roughly	O	O
a	O	O
microsecond	O	O
,	O	O
miniscule	O	O
compared	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
cost	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
operation	O	O
you	O	O
perform	O	O
with	O	O
them	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
only	O	O
drawing	O	O
object	O	O
that	O	O
is	O	O
expensive	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
Font	O	B-Class
.	O	O

Creating	O	O
one	O	O
involves	O	O
a	O	O
sizable	O	O
chunk	O	O
of	O	O
overhead	O	O
taken	O	O
by	O	O
the	O	O
font	O	B-Class
mapper	O	O
.	O	O

But	O	O
that	O	O
's	O	O
already	O	O
solved	O	O
by	O	O
.NET	O	B-Library
,	O	O
it	O	O
caches	O	O
them	O	O
.	O	O

Other	O	O
than	O	O
hogging	O	O
the	O	O
heap	O	B-Data_Structure
needlessly	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
programming	O	O
style	O	O
is	O	O
dangerous	O	O
.	O	O

It	O	O
is	O	O
far	O	O
too	O	O
easy	O	O
to	O	O
forget	O	O
blindly	O	O
applying	O	O
the	O	O
using	O	O
statement	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
certainly	O	O
can	O	O
get	O	O
you	O	O
into	O	O
trouble	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O
relying	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
finalizer	O	O
thread	O	O
to	O	O
release	O	O
them	O	O
again	O	O
.	O	O

If	O	O
a	O	O
program	O	O
involves	O	O
lots	O	O
of	O	O
heavy	O	O
painting	O	O
but	O	O
not	O	O
enough	O	O
object	O	O
allocation	O	O
to	O	O
trigger	O	O
a	O	O
GC	O	O
then	O	O
you	O	O
will	O	O
exhaust	O	O
the	O	O
quota	O	O
for	O	O
GDI	O	B-Library
objects	O	O
.	O	O

Which	O	O
is	O	O
10,000	O	O
objects	O	O
for	O	O
a	O	O
process	O	O
by	O	O
default	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
will	O	O
crash	O	O
your	O	O
program	O	O
.	O	O

Do	O	O
note	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
System.Drawing	O	B-Class
class	O	O
wrappers	O	O
are	O	O
not	O	O
nearly	O	O
big	O	O
enough	O	O
to	O	O
trigger	O	O
a	O	O
GC	O	O
by	O	O
themselves	O	O
,	O	O
10000	O	O
of	O	O
them	O	O
will	O	O
not	O	O
be	O	O
enough	O	O
to	O	O
get	O	O
the	O	O
finalizers	O	O
to	O	O
run	O	O
and	O	O
release	O	O
the	O	O
handles	O	O
again	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
problem	O	O
is	O	O
very	O	O
easy	O	O
to	O	O
diagnose	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
use	O	O
Task	O	B-Application
Manager	O	I-Application
.	O	O

Use	O	O
View	O	B-Value
+	O	O
Select	O	B-Value
Columns	O	B-User_Interface_Element
and	O	O
tick	O	O
"	O	B-Value
GDI	O	I-Value
Objects	O	I-Value
"	O	I-Value
.	O	O

Might	O	O
as	O	O
well	O	O
tick	O	O
"	O	B-Value
USER	O	I-Value
Objects	O	I-Value
"	O	I-Value
,	O	O
another	O	O
one	O	O
that	O	O
's	O	O
very	O	O
easily	O	O
leaked	O	O
.	O	O

Keep	O	O
an	O	O
eye	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
displayed	O	O
counts	O	O
for	O	O
your	O	O
process	O	O
while	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O
using	O	O
it	O	O
.	O	O

A	O	O
steadily	O	O
climbing	O	O
number	O	O
spells	O	O
doom	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
custom	O	O
experience	O	O
button	O	B-User_Interface_Element
for	O	O
the	O	O
page	O	B-Application
editor	O	I-Application
in	O	O
Sitecore	O	B-Application
which	O	O
references	O	O
a	O	O
custom	O	O
command	O	O
.	O	O

What	O	O
is	O	O
the	O	O
correct	O	O

to	O	O
open	O	O
a	O	O
SPEAK	O	B-Library
dialog	O	B-User_Interface_Element
from	O	O
this	O	O
context	O	O
and	O	O
how	O	O

a	O	O

EDIT	O	O

The	O	O

registry	O	B-Variable

seems	O	O

been	O	O
:	O	O

In	O	O
some	O	O
code	O	O
pages	O	O
the	O	O

is	O	O
the	O	O
same	O	O
byte	O	B-Data_Type
value	O	O
in	O	O

as	O	O
the	O	O
backslash	O	B-Value
.	O	O

If	O	O
you	O	O
're	O	O
using	O	O
Unicode	O	O
functions	O	O
this	O	O
should	O	O
n't	O	O
be	O	O
an	O	O

.	O	O

See	O	O
http://www.siao2.com/2005/09/17/469941.aspx	O	O
for	O	O
more	O	O

.	O	O

When	O	O
assigning	O	O
the	O	O
Registry	O	O
data	O	O
to	O	O
your	O	O

variable	O	O

you	O	O
are	O	O

as	O	O
null-terminated	O	B-Value
character	O	B-Data_Type
data	O	O
.	O	O

However	O	O
,	O	O
string	O	B-Data_Type
data	O	O

by	O	O
RegQueryValueEx()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
is	O	O
not	O	O
guaranteed	O	O
to	O	O
be	O	O
null-terminated	O	B-Value
,	O	O
if	O	O
the	O	O

writer	O	O

not	O	O

one	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
is	O	O
clearly	O	O
stated	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
documentation	O	O
.	O	O

Chances	O	O
are	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
string	O	B-Data_Type
data	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O

from	O	O

not	O	O

end	O	O

of	O	O
your	O	O
buffer	O	B-Class
.	O	O

actually	O	O

.	O	O

If	O	O

,	O	O

.	O	O

You	O	O
are	O	O
also	O	O
leaking	O	O
the	O	O
opened	O	O
Registry	O	O
key	O	O
handle	O	O
if	O	O
RegOpenKeyEx()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
succeeds	O	O
but	O	O
RegQueryValueEx()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
fails	O	O
.	O	O

Try	O	O
this	O	O
instead	O	O
:	O	O

To	O	O
avoid	O	O
this	O	O
issue	O	O
altogether	O	O

use	O	O
RegGetValue()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
instead	O	O
,	O	O
which	O	O
deals	O	O
with	O	O
the	O	O
null	O	B-Value
terminator	O	O
for	O	O
you	O	O
:	O	O

:	O	O

JSFiddle	O	B-Application
:	O	O
https://jsfiddle.net/rq9nm772/1/	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
the	O	O
next	O	O
strange	O	O

,	O	O
I	O	O
'm	O	O

:	O	O

is	O	O

So	O	O

how	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
somehow	O	O
the	O	O
data	O	O
appeared	O	O
in	O	O

is	O	O
there	O	O
before	O	O
onPostExecute	O	B-Function
is	O	O
shown	O	O
,	O	O
because	O	O
in	O	O
post	O	O
execute	O	O
the	O	O
progressbar	O	B-Class
should	O	O
go	O	O
invisible	O	O
and	O	O
notifydatasetchange	B-Code_Block	B-Function
should	O	O
also	O	O
appear	O	O
there	O	O
.	O	O

But	O	O
data	O	O
appears	O	O
before	O	O
the	O	O
progressbar	O	B-Class
goes	O	O
invisible	O	O
and	O	O
notifyDataSetChange()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
fired	O	O
,	O	O
help	O	O
me	O	O
please	O	O
!	O	O

An	O	O
AsyncTask	B-Code_Block	B-Class
that	O	O
returns	O	O
nothing	O	O
from	O	O
doInBackground()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
(	O	O
and	O	O
does	O	O

communicate	O	O
with	O	O

via	O	O
private	O	O
members	O	O
)	O	O
is	O	O
always	O	O
suspicious	O	O
.	O	O

You	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
lot	O	O
of	O	O
side	O	O
effects	O	O
in	O	O
your	O	O
AsyncTask	B-Code_Block	B-Class
and	O	O
that	O	O
kind	O	O
of	O	O
stuff	O	O
is	O	O
hard	O	O
to	O	O
debug	O	O
.	O	O

You	O	O
add	O	O
to	O	O
cityList	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
and	O	O

for	O	O
example	O	O
,	O	O
without	O	O
showing	O	O
what	O	O
that	O	O
actually	O	O
is	O	O
.	O	O

Presumably	O	O
those	O	O
are	O	O
lists	O	B-Data_Structure
attached	O	O
to	O	O
some	O	O
Adapter	B-Code_Block	B-Class
and	O	O
adding	O	O
to	O	O
those	O	O
might	O	O
trigger	O	O
a	O	O
View	B-Code_Block	B-Class
attached	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
Adapter	B-Code_Block	B-Class
to	O	O
be	O	O
re-drawn	O	O
.	O	O

If	O	O
that	O	O
is	O	O
the	O	O
case	O	O
you	O	O
could	O	O
try	O	O
calling	O	O
setNotifyOnChange(false)	B-Code_Block	B-Function
on	O	O
mAdapter	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
(	O	O
to	O	O
delay	O	O
updates	O	O
until	O	O
you	O	O
manually	O	O
call	O	O
notifyDataSetChanged()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
later	O	O
)	O	O
.	O	O

http://developer.android.com/reference/android/widget/ArrayAdapter.html#setNotifyOnChange(boolean)	O	O

In	O	O
general	O	O
,	O	O
if	O	O
your	O	O
AsyncTask	B-Code_Block	B-Class
does	O	O
n't	O	O
return	O	O
anything	O	O
or	O	O

.	O	O

node	O	O
.	O	O

Input	O	O

:	O	O

expected	O	O
data	O	O
:	O	O

The	O	O
trick	O	O
is	O	O
to	O	O
use	O	O

notation	O	O

gives	O	O

of	O	O

.	O	O

Basically	O	O
non-root	O	O
nodes	O	O
are	O	O
attached	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
parents	O	O

and	O	O

to	O	O
result	O	O
array	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
the	O	O
following	O	O

that	O	O

in	O	O

of	O	O

.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
inserted	O	O
it	O	O
into	O	O

So	O	O

.	O	O

I	O	O
do	O	O

.	O	O

to	O	O

"	O	O
package.json	O	B-File_Name
"	O	O

for	O	O

.	O	O

For	O	O

and	O	O

.	O	O

,	O	O
that	O	O
means	O	O
"	O	B-Value
all	O	I-Value
versions	O	I-Value
"	O	I-Value
.	O	O

If	O	O
you	O	O
want	O	O
,	O	O

can	O	O
set	O	O
a	O	O
specific	O	O
version	O	O
.	O	O

If	O	O

to	O	O

more	O	O
about	O	O
this	O	O
,	O	O
that	O	O

a	O	O
useful	O	O
link	O	O
:	O	O
https://npmjs.org/doc/json.html	O	O

I	O	O
want	O	O
a	O	O
placeholder	O	O
value	O	O
to	O	O
hold	O	O

to	O	O
a	O	O

however	O	O

does	O	O

}	O	B-Code_Block

You	O	O
can	O	O
increase	O	O

of	O	O

you	O	O

5	O	O
minutes	O	O
(	O	O
5*3600l	O	O
)	O	O
.	O	O

Android	O	B-Operating_System
L	O	B-Version
has	O	O
new	O	O
scanning	O	B-Library
APIs	O	I-Library
which	O	O
promise	O	O
to	O	O
help	O	O
improve	O	O

between	O	O

and	O	O

usage	O	O
.	O	O

But	O	O
for4.3	O	B-Version
and	O	O
4.4	O	B-Version
apps	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
need	O	O
to	O	O
make	O	O
a	O	O
judgment	O	O
call	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
'm	O	O
using	O	O
Java	O	B-Language
6	O	B-Version
.	O	O

Do	O	O
you	O	O
think	O	O
there	O	O
's	O	O
a	O	O
reason	O	O
why	O	O
there	O	O
are	O	O
conditional	O	O
expressions	O	O

and	O	O
not	O	O
loop	O	O
expressions	O	O

which	O	O
adds	O	O
elements	O	O
from	O	O
schedule	O	O
into	O	O
weeklyPlan	O	B-Variable
while	O	O
hasNext()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
.	O	O

Or	O	O
do	O	O
some	O	O
languages	O	O
have	O	O
this	O	O
feature	O	O
or	O	O
something	O	O
similar	O	O
?	O	O

These	O	O
"	O	O
loop	O	O
expressions	O	O
"	O	O
,	O	O
in	O	O
a	O	O
slightly	O	O
different	O	O
form	O	O
,	O	O
are	O	O
called	O	O
closures	O	O
.	O	O

In	O	O
groovy-code	O	B-Language
:	O	O

That	O	O
is	O	O
-	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
define	O	O
what	O	O
happens	O	O
with	O	O
each	O	O
object	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
schedule	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
collection	O	O
.	O	O

Java	O	B-Language
does	O	O
not	O	O
yet	O	O
support	O	O
closures	O	O
.	O	O

There	O	O
it	O	O
is	O	O
implemented	O	O
with	O	O
anonymous	O	O
classes	O	O
.	O	O

Of	O	O
course	O	O
closures	O	O
are	O	O
more	O	O
than	O	O
that	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
this	O	O
is	O	O
only	O	O
one	O	O
of	O	O
their	O	O
applications	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
think	O	O
it	O	O
's	O	O
because	O	O
conditional	O	O
expressions	O	O
are	O	O
much	O	O
easier	O	O
to	O	O
implement	O	O
without	O	O
having	O	O
to	O	O
worry	O	O
about	O	O
pesky	O	O
details	O	O
.	O	O

For	O	O
example	O	O
,	O	O
looking	O	O
at	O	O
your	O	O
code	O	O
,	O	O
are	O	O
you	O	O
saying	O	O
that	O	O
weeklyPlan.add	O	B-Function
will	O	O
be	O	O
called	O	O
multiple	O	O
times	O	O
?	O	O

In	O	O
that	O	O
case	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
scope	O	O
of	O	O
your	O	O
=>	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
operator	O	O

in	O	O

:	O	O

Explanation	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
flags	O	O
:	O	O

-F	O	B-Code_Block
prints	O	O
the	O	O
full	O	O
date	O	O
and	O	O
times	O	O
-	O	O
which	O	O

that	O	O

what	O	O
you	O	O
wanted	O	O
to	O	O
know	O	O
.	O	O

suppresses	O	O
the	O	O
hostname	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
output	O	O
.	O	O

You	O	O
do	O	O

need	O	O
that	O	O
.	O	O

-x	O	B-Code_Block
shows	O	O
shutdown	O	O

runlevel	O	O
changes	O	O
-	O	O
now	O	O
that	O	O
's	O	O
what	O	O
you	O	O
wanted	O	O
to	O	O
know	O	O
.	O	O

Finally	O	O
the	O	O
grep	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
statement	O	O
filters	O	O
out	O	O
the	O	O
boot	O	O

messages	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
would	O	O
recomend	O	O
code	O	O
that	O	O
looks	O	O
like	O	O
the	O	O
following	O	O
:	O	O

The	O	O
couple	O	O
of	O	O
differences	O	O
.	O	O

First	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
always	O	O
open	O	B-Function
the	O	O
file	O	B-Class
in	O	O
append	B-Code_Block	O
mode	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
way	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
file	O	B-Class
will	O	O
be	O	O
flushed	O	O
every	O	O
time	O	O
.	O	O

Next	O	O
,	O	O
it	O	O
will	O	O
always	O	O
update	O	O
the	O	O
file	O	B-Class
with	O	O
the	O	O
amount	O	O
of	O	O

elapsed	O	O
.	O	O

So	O	O
even	O	O
if	O	O
your	O	O
raspberry	O	B-Device

down	O	O

should	O	O

to	O	O
recover	O	O
it	O	O
.	O	O

.	O	O

simply	O	O

value	O	O

Your	O	O

.	O	O

between	O	O

is	O	O
more	O	O

.	O	O

between	O	O

.	O	O

.	O	O

In	O	O
most	O	O

is	O	O

.	O	O

between	O	O

is	O	O

is	O	O

,	O	O

.	O	O

is	O	O

obsolete	O	O
or	O	O

?	O	O

I	O	O
am	O	O
coding	O	O
in	O	O
Qt	O	B-Application

.	O	O

I	O	O

a	O	O

0.1	O	B-Value

Method	O	O

Method	O	O

with	O	O
literal	O	O

of	O	O
0.1	O	B-Value
:	O	O

My	O	O
environment	O	O
is	O	O
Windows	O	B-Operating_System
64	O	B-Version
bit	O	O
OS	O	O
using	O	O
Qt	O	B-Application
5.2.1	O	B-Version
and	O	O
compiling	O	O
using	O	O
Microsoft	O	B-Application
2010	O	I-Application
Visual	O	I-Application
Studio	O	I-Application
compiler	O	I-Application
in	O	O
32	O	O
bit	O	O
.	O	O

Many	O	O
decimal	O	O
numbers	O	O
are	O	O
not	O	O
exactly	O	O
representable	O	O
in	O	O
IEEE	O	O

point	O	O
(	O	O
i.e	O	O
.	O	O
the	O	O
binary	O	O
representation	O	O
used	O	O
for	O	O
double	B-Code_Block	B-Data_Type
)	O	O
and	O	O
0.1	O	B-Value
falls	O	O
in	O	O
this	O	O
camp	O	O
.	O	O

When	O	O
you	O	O
type	O	O
0.1	B-Code_Block	B-Value
the	O	O
C++	O	B-Language
compiler	O	B-Application
is	O	O
required	O	O
to	O	O

a	O	O
double	B-Code_Block	B-Data_Type
to	O	O
be	O	O
represented	O	O
on	O	O
your	O	O
hardware	O	O
.	O	O

It	O	O
does	O	O
so	O	O
by	O	O
computing	O	O
a	O	O
near	O	O
approximation	O	O
of	O	O
this	O	O
and	O	O
so	O	O
you	O	O
see	O	O
a	O	O
bit	O	O
of	O	O
error	O	O
.	O	O

If	O	O
you	O	O

something	O	O
like	O	O
a	O	O
power	O	O
of	O	O
two	O	O
:	O	O
0.5	B-Code_Block	B-Value
,	O	O
0.25	B-Code_Block	B-Value
these	O	O
will	O	O
be	O	O
exactly	O	O
represented	O	O
.	O	O

See	O	O
this	O	O
link	O	O
for	O	O
a	O	O
much	O	O
more	O	O
in-depth	O	O
description	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
idea	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
is	O	O
normal	O	O
behaviour	O	O
in	O	O
any	O	O
computer	O	B-Device
.	O	O

It	O	O
's	O	O
caused	O	O
by	O	O
the	O	O
fact	O	O
that	O	O
decimal	O	B-Data_Type
numbers	O	I-Data_Type
are	O	O
being	O	O
stored	O	O
in	O	O
fixed-sized	O	O
binary	O	O
memory	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
extra	O	O
digits	O	O
come	O	O
from	O	O
the	O	O

caused	O	O

from	O	O

to	O	O

.	O	O

You	O	O
will	O	O
not	O	O
get	O	O
rid	O	O
of	O	O
them	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
best	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
do	O	O
is	O	O
choose	O	O
a	O	O
precision	O	O
(	O	O
either	O	O
float	B-Code_Block	B-Data_Type
or	O	O
double	B-Code_Block	B-Data_Type
)	O	O
that	O	O
is	O	O
big	O	O
enough	O	O
so	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
extra	O	O
error	O	O
digits	O	O
will	O	O
not	O	O
make	O	O
any	O	O
difference	O	O
to	O	O
your	O	O
solution	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
then	O	O
chop	O	O
them	O	O
off	O	O
when	O	O
you	O	O
display	O	O
the	O	O
number	O	O
.	O	O

When	O	O
my	O	O
view	O	B-Class
controller	O	I-Class
is	O	O
first	O	O
presented	O	O
,	O	O
I	O	O
want	O	O
it	O	O
to	O	O
potentially	O	O

a	O	O
cache	O	O
that	O	O
provides	O	O
the	O	O

for	O	O
that	O	O
view	O	O
.	O	O

However	O	O
,	O	O
when	O	O
the	O	O
user	O	O
taps	O	O
the	O	O
back	O	O
button	O	B-User_Interface_Element
from	O	O
a	O	O
deeper	O	O
view	O	B-Class
controller	O	I-Class
to	O	O
return	O	O
to	O	O
this	O	O
view	O	B-Class

,	O	O

to	O	O

the	O	O
cache	O	O
again	O	O
.	O	O

Which	O	O
event	O	O
should	O	O
I	O	O
be	O	O
using	O	O
?	O	O

in	O	O

,	O	O

.	O	O

will	O	O
be	O	O
fired	O	O
every	O	O
time	O	O
the	O	O
view	O	O
will	O	O
appear	O	O
.	O	O

will	O	O
be	O	O
fired	O	O
every	O	O
time	O	O
the	O	O
view	O	O
has	O	O
been	O	O
loaded	O	O
from	O	O
the	O	O
nib	O	B-File_Type
,	O	O
which	O	O
I	O	O
believe	O	O
could	O	O
happen	O	O
a	O	O
second	O	O

if	O	O
there	O	O
's	O	O
a	O	O
memory	O	O
warning	O	O
.	O	O

(	O	O
Or	O	O
is	O	O
this	O	O
wrong	O	O
?	O	O
)	O	O

Since	O	O
this	O	O
is	O	O
not	O	O
a	O	O
memory	O	O
resident	O	O
cache	O	O
,	O	O
it	O	O
seems	O	O
the	O	O
wrong	O	O

to	O	O
handle	O	O
this	O	O
.	O	O

having	O	O
the	O	O
caller	O	O
call	O	O
something	O	O
extra	O	O
is	O	O
inelegant	O	O
,	O	O
if	O	O
there	O	O
's	O	O
a	O	O
built-in	O	O
way	O	O
to	O	O
handle	O	O
this	O	O
.	O	O

To	O	O
clarify	O	O
,	O	O
this	O	O
is	O	O
not	O	O
a	O	O
memory	O	O
resident	O	O
cache	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
is	O	O
parsing	O	O
an	O	O
XML	O	B-File_Type
file	O	O
to	O	O
binary	O	B-File_Type
.	O	O

The	O	O
binary	O	B-File_Type
is	O	O
loaded	O	O
and	O	O
unloaded	O	O
in	O	O
viewDidLoad	B-Code_Block	B-Function
and	O	O
viewDidUnload	B-Code_Block	B-Function
.	O	O

This	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
prerequisite	O	O
for	O	O
that	O	O
step	O	O
,	O	O
making	O	O
sure	O	O
the	O	O
binary	O	B-File_Type
is	O	O
up-to-date	O	O
prior	O	O
to	O	O
it	O	O
being	O	O
loaded	O	O
.	O	O

load	O	O
the	O	O
cache	O	O
in	O	O
viewDidLoad	O	B-Function
and	O	O
release	O	O
it	O	O
in	O	O
viewDidUnload	O	B-Function
and	O	O
dealloc	O	B-Function
.	O	O

viewDidUnload	O	B-Function
is	O	O
called	O	O
during	O	O
low-memory	O	O
conditions	O	O
.	O	O

if	O	O
you	O	O
want	O	O
your	O	O
app	O	O
to	O	O
remain	O	O
responsive	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
'd	O	O
free	O	O
up	O	O
as	O	O
much	O	O
memory	O	O
as	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
.	O	O

well	O	O
explained	O	O
here	O	O
:	O	O
When	O	O
should	O	O
I	O	O
release	O	O
objects	O	O
in	O	O
-(void)viewDidUnload	O	B-Function
rather	O	O
than	O	O
in	O	O
-dealloc	O	B-Function
?	O	O

Using	O	O
init	B-Code_Block	B-Function
may	O	O
work	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
I	O	O
would	O	O
recommend	O	O
a	O	O
simple	O	O
subclass	O	O
of	O	O
UINavigationController	B-Code_Block	B-Class
.	O	O

Create	O	O
a	O	O
new	O	O
method	O	O
called	O	O
setRootTableViewController	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block

.	O	O

:	O	O

do	O	O

how	O	O
it	O	O
works	O	O
.	O	O

What	O	O
is	O	O
happening	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
background	O	O
?	O	O

Does	O	O
Waffle	O	B-Library
get	O	O
the	O	O
Kerberos	O	O
ticket	O	O
from	O	O
Windows	O	B-Operating_System
?	O	O

How	O	O
does	O	O
the	O	O
server	O	B-Application
validate	O	O
the	O	O
ticket	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
client	O	B-Application
?	O	O

Can	O	O
I	O	O
absolutely	O	O
trust	O	O
the	O	O
user	O	O
groups	O	O
which	O	O
I	O	O
get	O	O
after	O	O
the	O	O
do-loop	O	B-Code_Block

from	O	O
the	O	O
server	O	B-Application
context	O	O
?	O	O

Thanks	O	O
.	O	O

Thomas	O	B-User_Name
.	O	O

Waffle	O	B-Library
uses	O	O
the	O	O
Windows	O	B-Application
SSPI	O	I-Application
,	O	O
which	O	O
performs	O	O
all	O	O
operations	O	O
involving	O	O
Kerberos	O	O
tickets	O	O
on	O	O
client	O	B-Application
's	O	O
behalf	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
client	O	B-Application
never	O	O
sees	O	O
the	O	O
ticket	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
basic	O	O
Kerberos	O	O
question	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
token	O	O
sent	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
server	O	B-Application
is	O	O
encrypted	O	O
by	O	O
server	O	B-Variable
's	O	O
secret	O	I-Variable
key	O	I-Variable
,	O	O
which	O	O
guarantees	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
token	O	O
was	O	O
created	O	O
by	O	O
the	O	O
Ticket	O	B-Application
Granting	O	I-Application
Service	O	I-Application
,	O	O
which	O	O
authenticated	O	O
the	O	O
client	O	B-Application
.	O	O

Yes	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
are	O	O
retrieved	O	O
from	O	O
the	O	O
security	O	B-Variable
token	O	I-Variable
.	O	O

This	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O

defined	O	O

layer	O	O

.	O	O

on	O	O
[	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block

.	O	O

So	O	O
,	O	O

a	O	O

.	O	O

activity	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
an	O	O
existing	O	O
java	O	B-Language
based	O	O

,	O	O

to	O	O
use	O	O
node	O	B-Application
js	O	I-Application
and	O	O
redis	O	B-Application
for	O	O
real-time	O	O
streaming	O	O
rates	O	O
.	O	O

How	O	O
can	O	O
i	O	O
use	O	O
node	O	B-Application
js	O	I-Application
and	O	O
redis	O	B-Application
to	O	O
my	O	O
existing	O	O
java	O	B-Language
based	O	O
application	O	O
deployed	O	O
in	O	O
weblogic	O	B-Application
.	O	O

I	O	O
'm	O	O
writing	O	O
some	O	O
software	O	O
that	O	O
talks	O	O
to	O	O
external	O	O
hardware	O	O
via	O	O
a	O	O
dll	O	B-Library
(	O	O
moving	O	O
some	O	O
motors	O	O
and	O	O
reading	O	O
some	O	O
values	O	O
back	O	O
)	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
calls	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
dll	O	B-Library
are	O	O
blocking	O	O
and	O	O
may	O	O
not	O	O
return	O	O
for	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
order	O	O
of	O	O
10	O	O
seconds	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
software	O	O
performs	O	O
a	O	O
scan	O	O
by	O	O
moving	O	O
the	O	O
hardware	O	O
,	O	O
taking	O	O
a	O	O
reading	O	O
and	O	O
repeating	O	O
for	O	O
a	O	O
number	O	O
of	O	O
points	O	O
.	O	O

One	O	O
scan	O	O
can	O	O
take	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
order	O	O
of	O	O
30	O	O
minutes	O	O
to	O	O
complete	O	O
.	O	O

While	O	O
the	O	O
scan	O	O
is	O	O
running	O	O
I	O	O
would	O	O
obviously	O	O
like	O	O
the	O	O
GUI	O	B-User_Interface_Element
to	O	O
be	O	O
responsive	O	O
and	O	O
a	O	O
live	O	O
graph	O	B-Data_Structure
(	O	O
in	O	O
an	O	O
MDI	O	B-Class
Child	O	I-Class
)	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
incoming	O	O
data	O	O
to	O	O
be	O	O
updated	O	O
at	O	O
each	O	O
point	O	O
.	O	O

Multithreading	O	O
seems	O	O
the	O	O
obvious	O	O
choice	O	O
for	O	O
this	O	O
problem	O	O
.	O	O

My	O	O
question	O	O
is	O	O
,	O	O
what	O	O
is	O	O
the	O	O
best	O	O
way	O	O
to	O	O
thread	O	O
this	O	O
and	O	O
talk	O	O
back	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
main	O	O
VCL	O	B-Library
thread	O	O
to	O	O
update	O	O
the	O	O
graph	O	B-Data_Structure
during	O	O
a	O	O
scan	O	O
?	O	O

I	O	O
currently	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
single	O	O
TThread	O	B-Class
descendant	O	O
that	O	O
performs	O	O
the	O	O
'	O	O
scan	O	O
logic	O	O
'	O	O
and	O	O
an	O	O
array	O	B-Data_Structure
of	O	O
doubles	O	B-Data_Type
in	O	O
the	O	O
public	O	O
var	O	B-Data_Type
section	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
ChildForm	O	B-Class
.	O	O

I	O	O
need	O	O
to	O	O
fill	O	O
out	O	O
this	O	O
array	O	B-Data_Structure
from	O	O
the	O	O
thread	O	O
but	O	O
I	O	O
do	O	O
n't	O	O
know	O	O
whether	O	O
to	O	O
use	O	O
Synchronize	O	B-Function
or	O	O
CriticalSection	O	B-Function
or	O	O
PostMessage	O	B-Function
or	O	O
some	O	O
other	O	O
method	O	O
.	O	O

Each	O	O
time	O	O
a	O	O
new	O	O
value	O	O
is	O	O
added	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
main	O	O
VCL	O	B-Library
thread	O	O
needs	O	O
to	O	O
update	O	O
the	O	O
graph	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

Should	O	O
I	O	O
really	O	O
have	O	O
an	O	O
intermediary	O	O
object	O	O
for	O	O
the	O	O
data	O	O
that	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
global	O	B-Data_Type
var	O	I-Data_Type
and	O	O
access	O	O
this	O	O
from	O	O
the	O	O
Thread	O	B-Class
and	O	O
the	O	O
ChildForm	O	B-Class
separately	O	O
somehow	O	O
?	O	O

I	O	O
find	O	O
that	O	O
populating	O	O
a	O	O
TThreadList	B-Code_Block	B-Class
from	O	O
the	O	O
background	O	O
thread	O	O
,	O	O
then	O	O
posting	O	O
a	O	O
message	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
main	O	O
thread	O	O
that	O	O
there	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
new	O	O
item	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
list	O	B-Data_Structure
,	O	O
then	O	O
processing	O	O
the	O	O
list	O	B-Data_Structure
in	O	O
the	O	O
main	O	O
thread	O	O
is	O	O
simple	O	O
and	O	O
easily	O	O
maintainable	O	O
.	O	O

With	O	O
this	O	O
method	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
could	O	O
store	O	O
as	O	O
many	O	O
readings	O	O
as	O	O
you	O	O
wanted	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
list	O	B-Data_Structure
,	O	O
and	O	O
every	O	O
time	O	O
the	O	O
main	O	O
thread	O	O
received	O	O
a	O	O
message	O	O
,	O	O
it	O	O
would	O	O
simply	O	O
process	O	O
all	O	O
the	O	O
items	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
list	O	B-Data_Structure
at	O	O
once	O	O
.	O	O

Define	O	O
a	O	O
class	O	O
for	O	O
the	O	O
readings	O	O
,	O	O
instantiate	O	O
them	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
add	O	O
them	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
list	O	B-Data_Structure
in	O	O
the	O	O
background	O	O
thread	O	O
.	O	O

Do	O	O
n't	O	O
forget	O	O
to	O	O
free	O	O
them	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
main	O	O
thread	O	O
when	O	O
you	O	O
pop	O	O
them	O	O
off	O	O
the	O	O
list	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

If	O	O
you	O	O
want	O	O
to	O	O
invest	O	O
a	O	O
little	O	O
more	O	O
then	O	O
a	O	O
simple	O	O
Synchronize	O	B-Function
call	O	O
which	O	O
by	O	O
the	O	O
way	O	O
blocks	O	O
the	O	O
main	O	O
thread	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
add	O	O
a	O	O
simple	O	O
FIFO	O	O
queue	O	B-Data_Structure
with	O	O
messaging	O	O
on	O	O
top	O	O
of	O	O
it	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
flow	O	O
of	O	O
data	O	O
would	O	O
be	O	O
like	O	O
this	O	O
:	O	O

The	O	O
thread	O	O
puts	O	O
the	O	O
data	O	O
into	O	O
the	O	O
queue	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

The	O	O
thread	O	O
post	O	O
a	O	O
message	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
main	O	O
thread	O	O
window	O	O
.	O	O

Which	O	O
one	O	O
I	O	O
do	O	O
n't	O	O
care	O	O
:)	O	O

You	O	O
handle	O	O
the	O	O
message	O	O
that	O	O
data	O	O
is	O	O
available	O	O
and	O	O
process	O	O
any	O	O
messages	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
queue	O	B-Data_Structure
as	O	O
you	O	O
see	O	O
fit	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
code	O	O
would	O	O
look	O	O
something	O	O
like	O	O
this	O	O
:	O	O

the	O	O
queue	O	B-Data_Structure
..	O	O
.	O	O

the	O	O

is	O	O

into	O	O
the	O	O

..	O	O

.	O	O

SOLUTION	O	O

Well	O	O

a	O	O

release	O	O
(	O	O
2.0-RC6	O	B-Version
)	O	O

It	O	O
seems	O	O
that	O	O
there	O	O
was	O	O
a	O	O
bug	O	O
in	O	O
__construct	B-Code_Block	B-Function
of	O	O

(	O	O
reported	O	O

December	O	O

.	O	O

I	O	O

pretty	O	O

but	O	O

2	O	O

(	O	O
ROLE_GROUP1	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
,	O	O
ROLE_GROUP	B-Code_Block	B-Variable

and	O	O

user	O	O

EDIT	O	O

I	O	O
just	O	O
drilled	O	O
down	O	O
through	O	O
the	O	O
Symfony	O	B-Application
's	O	O
code	O	O
and	O	O
found	O	O
out	O	O
that	O	O
permission	O	O
grant	O	O
fails	O	O
in	O	O
equals	B-Code_Block	B-Function
method	O	O
of	O	O
RoleSecurityIdentity	B-Code_Block	B-Class
.	O	O

It	O	O
turns	O	O
out	O	O
that	O	O
$sid->getRole()	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
is	O	O
string	B-Code_Block	B-Data_Type
"	O	O
ROLE_GROUP1	O	B-Variable
"	O	O
while	O	O
$	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
this->role	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
is	O	O
Role	B-Code_Block	B-Class
object	O	O
of	O	O
ROLE_GROUP1	O	B-Variable
role	O	O
.	O	O

Just	O	O
to	O	O
mark	O	O
this	O	O
question	O	O
as	O	O
resolved	O	O
.	O	O

Solution	O	O
:	O	O

Well	O	O
,	O	O
that	O	O
's	O	O
what	O	O
I	O	O
get	O	O
when	O	O
I	O	O
use	O	O
a	O	O
bit	O	O
oldish	O	O
Symfony2	O	B-Application
release	O	O
(	O	O
2.0-RC6	O	B-Version
)	O	O
.	O	O

It	O	O
seems	O	O
that	O	O
there	O	O
was	O	O
a	O	O
bug	O	O
in	O	O
__construct	O	B-Function
of	O	O
RoleSecurityIdentity	O	B-Class
(	O	O
reported	O	O
back	O	O
in	O	O
December	O	O
'	O	O
10	O	O
)	O	O
.	O	O

Instead	O	O
of	O	O
instance	O	O
of	O	O
Role	O	B-Class
it	O	O
should	O	O
be	O	O
instance	O	O
of	O	O
RoleInstance	O	B-Class
.	O	O

I	O	O
should	O	O
probably	O	O
close	O	O
this	O	O
question	O	O
..	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
two	O	O
tables	O	O
as	O	O
follows	O	O
:	O	O

The	O	O
two	O	O
tables	O	B-Data_Structure
are	O	O
related	O	O
through	O	O
Foreign-key	O	B-Variable
:	O	I-Variable
FkOriginalTextId	O	I-Variable

Basically	O	O
,	O	O
OriginalText	O	B-Class
will	O	O
have	O	O
key/value	O	B-Variable
pairs	O	O
for	O	O
different	O	O
languages	O	O
.	O	O

If	O	O
a	O	O
particular	O	O
client	O	B-Application
wants	O	O
a	O	O
certain	O	O
value	O	O
to	O	O
be	O	O
customized	O	O
then	O	O
it	O	O
goes	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
CustomText	O	B-Class
table	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

An	O	O
example	O	O
would	O	O
be	O	O
OriginalText	O	B-Class
:	O	O
Employee	O	B-Variable
,	O	O
CustomText	O	B-Class
:	O	O
Staff-member	O	B-Variable
for	O	O
the	O	O
key	O	B-Variable
:	O	O
Employee	O	B-Variable
.	O	O

I	O	O
want	O	O
to	O	O
write	O	O
a	O	O
Lambda/Linq	O	B-Library
to	O	O
get	O	O
all	O	O
the	O	O
text	O	O
of	O	O
a	O	O
given	O	O
language	O	O
from	O	O
the	O	O
OriginalText	O	B-Class
table	O	B-Data_Structure
,	O	O
but	O	O
the	O	O
TextValue	O	B-Variable
should	O	O
be	O	O
overriden	O	O
if	O	O
there	O	O
's	O	O
a	O	O
custom	O	O
replacement	O	O
for	O	O
that	O	O
key	O	B-Variable
in	O	O
the	O	O
CustomText	O	B-Class
table	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

I	O	O
can	O	O
do	O	O
this	O	O
using	O	O
multiple	O	O
SQL	O	B-Language
statements	O	O
by	O	O
getting	O	O
the	O	O
OriginalText	O	B-Class
values	O	O
to	O	O
a	O	O
temp	O	B-Variable
table	O	B-Data_Structure
and	O	O
later	O	O
on	O	O
updating	O	O
them	O	O
with	O	O
CustomText	O	B-Class
value	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
is	O	O
there	O	O
's	O	O
a	O	O
better	O	O
way	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
that	O	O
?	O	O

Perhaps	O	O
using	O	O
a	O	O
CTE	O	O
?	O	O

P.S	O	O
.	O	O
I	O	O
want	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
this	O	O
using	O	O
LINQ	O	B-Library
or	O	O
Lambda	O	B-Library
expressions	O	O

As	O	O
two	O	O
tables	O	B-Data_Structure
have	O	O
relations	O	O
so	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
easily	O	O
check	O	O
if	O	O
each	O	O
OriginalText	B-Code_Block	B-Class
item	O	O
has	O	O
a	O	O
CustomText	B-Code_Block	B-Class
or	O	O
not	O	O
.	O	O

and	O	O
get	O	O
value	O	O
from	O	O
CustomText	B-Code_Block	B-Class
if	O	O
exists	O	O
:	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
just	O	O
normalized	O	O
the	O	O
font	O	B-Variable
size	O	I-Variable
with	O	O
this	O	O
:	O	O

Now	O	O
I	O	O
would	O	O
like	O	O
to	O	O
resize	O	O
the	O	O
heading	O	B-User_Interface_Element
tags	O	O
giving	O	O
percentages	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
<h1>,	B-Code_Block	B-HTML_XML_Tag
<h2>	I-Code_Block	I-HTML_XML_Tag
.	O	O

Something	O	O
like	O	O
this	O	O
:	O	O

As	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
see	O	O
,	O	O
I	O	O
gave	O	O
a	O	O
percentage	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
h2	O	B-HTML_XML_Tag
,	O	O
but	O	O
what	O	O
are	O	O
the	O	O
percentages	O	O
for	O	O
the	O	O
rest	O	O
of	O	O
them	O	O
?	O	O

The	O	O
percentages	O	O
can	O	O
be	O	O
whatever	O	O
you	O	O
want	O	O
them	O	O
to	O	O
be	O	O
.	O	O

There	O	O
's	O	O
nothing	O	O
saying	O	O
that	O	O
an	O	O
H1	O	B-HTML_XML_Tag
has	O	O
to	O	O
be	O	O
bigger	O	O
than	O	O
an	O	O
H2	O	B-HTML_XML_Tag
,	O	O
that	O	O
's	O	O
just	O	O
the	O	O
default	O	O
.	O	O

View	O	O
the	O	O
falowing	O	O
link	O	O
,	O	O
it	O	O
might	O	O
help	O	O
you	O	O
solve	O	O
that	O	O
:	O	O

CSS	O	B-Language
FONT	O	B-Variable
SIZE	O	I-Variable
em	O	O
vs	O	O
px	O	O
vs	O	O
pt	O	O
vs	O	O
%	O	O

I	O	O
found	O	O
this	O	O
link	O	O
with	O	O
a	O	O
conversion	O	O
table	O	B-User_Interface_Element
.	O	O

I	O	O
am	O	O
trying	O	O
to	O	O
assign	O	O
click	O	O
event	O	O
to	O	O
a	O	O
button	O	B-User_Interface_Element
using	O	O
live	O	B-Function
and	O	O
want	O	O
the	O	O
user	O	O
can	O	O
only	O	O
trigger	O	O
it	O	O
only	O	O
once	O	O
.	O	O

Are	O	O
there	O	O
anyways	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
it	O	O
?	O	O

Please	O	O
note	O	O
:	O	O
The	O	O
button	O	B-User_Interface_Element
is	O	O
created	O	O
dynamically	O	O
.	O	O

You	O	O
can	O	O
use	O	O
one()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
with	O	O
delegated	O	O
handlers	O	O
as	O	O
well	O	O
(	O	O
in	O	O
jQuery	O	B-Library
1.7	O	B-Version
+	O	O
)	O	O
and	O	O
replace	O	O
the	O	O
deprecated	O	O
live()	B-Code_Block	B-Function
function	O	O
with	O	O
something	O	O
like	O	O
this	O	O
:	O	O

replace	O	O
document	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
with	O	O
the	O	O
closest	O	O
non-dynamic	O	O
parent	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
best	O	O
option	O	O
is	O	O
to	O	O
use	O	O
.one	O	B-Function
instead	O	O
of	O	O
live	O	B-Function
for	O	O
the	O	O
button	O	B-User_Interface_Element
.	O	O

That	O	O
makes	O	O
more	O	O
sense.	O	O
.	O	O

If	O	O
you	O	O
do	O	O
not	O	O
want	O	O
to	O	O
use	O	O
it	O	O
then	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
use	O	O
a	O	O
Hiddenfield	O	O
in	O	O
your	O	O
page	O	O
and	O	O
when	O	O
the	O	O
click	O	O
event	O	O
is	O	O
triggered	O	O
then	O	O
set	O	O
the	O	O
flag	O	B-Variable
value.	O	O
.	O	O

Next	O	O
time	O	O
when	O	O
you	O	O
click	O	O

button	O	O
check	O	O
for	O	O
the	O	O
flag	O	B-Variable
value	O	O
,	O	O
if	O	O
it	O	O
was	O	O
already	O	O
executed	O	O
once	O	O
then	O	O
do	O	O
not	O	O
run	O	O
the	O	O
code	O	O
inside	O	O
it.	O	O
.	O	O

Check	O	O
this	O	O
example	O	O
http://jsfiddle.net/sushanth009/Fakb5/	O	O

Also	O	O
note	O	O
that	O	O
.live	O	B-Function
is	O	O
deprecated	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
current	O	O
jQuery	O	B-Library
version	O	O
.	O	O

It	O	O
is	O	O
preferred	O	O
to	O	O
use	O	O
.on()	O	B-Function
instead	O	O

Why	O	O
am	O	O
I	O	O
getting	O	O
this	O	O
error	O	O
?	O	O

Here	O	O
's	O	O
the	O	O
code	O	O
.	O	O

.	O	O

sorry	O	O
for	O	O
the	O	O
dumb	O	O
question	O	O
:	O	O

I	O	O
am	O	O
trying	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
arrays	O	B-Data_Structure
which	O	O
are	O	O
lists	O	B-Data_Structure
in	O	O
python	O	B-Language
(	O	O
for	O	O
the	O	O
first	O	O

)	O	O

and	O	O
I	O	O
am	O	O
also	O	O
new	O	O
to	O	O
coding	O	O
and	O	O
python	O	B-Language
.	O	O

Here	O	O
:	O	O

You	O	O
assign	O	O
playerHand	O	B-Variable

randint	B-Code_Block	B-Function
,	O	O

is	O	O
an	O	O

.	O	O

:	O	O

attempt	O	O

a	O	O
list	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

The	O	O
wrong	O	O
version	O	O
:	O	O

The	O	O
correct	O	O
version	O	O
:	O	O

So	O	O
confusingly	O	O
@IfProfileValue	B-Code_Block	B-Class
has	O	O
nothing	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
with	O	O

.	O	O

in	O	O

.	O	O

.	O	O

not	O	O

on	O	O

(	I-Code_Block	I-Class
"	I-Code_Block	I-Class

I	O	O
tried	O	O

name	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block

which	O	O
I	O	O

The	O	O
reason	O	O
that	O	O
@IfProfileValue	B-Code_Block	B-Class
has	O	O
nothing	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
with	O	O
@Profile	B-Code_Block	B-Class
or	O	O
@ActiveProfiles	B-Code_Block	B-Class
is	O	O
due	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
evolution	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
framework	O	O
.	O	O

See	O	O
below	O	O
for	O	O
further	O	O
details	O	O
.	O	O

These	O	O
statements	O	O
are	O	O
not	O	O
entirely	O	O
correct	O	O
,	O	O
especially	O	O
the	O	O
last	O	O
part	O	O
.	O	O

@Profile	B-Code_Block	B-Class
is	O	O
used	O	O
to	O	O
selectively	O	O
enable	O	O
a	O	O
component	O	O
(	O	O
e.g	O	O
.	O	O
,	O	O
@Service	B-Code_Block	B-Class
,	O	O
etc	O	O
.	O	O
)	O	O
,	O	O
@Configuration	B-Code_Block	B-Class
class	O	O
,	O	O
or	O	O
@Bean	B-Code_Block	B-Function
method	O	O
if	O	O
one	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
named	O	O
bean	O	O
definition	O	O
profiles	O	B-Variable
is	O	O
active	O	B-Value
in	O	O
the	O	O
Spring	O	B-Class
Environment	B-Code_Block	I-Class
for	O	O
the	O	O
ApplicationContext	B-Code_Block	B-Class
.	O	O

This	O	O
annotation	O	O
is	O	O
not	O	O
directly	O	O
related	O	O
to	O	O
testing	O	O
:	O	O
@Profile	B-Code_Block	B-Class
should	O	O
not	O	O
be	O	O
used	O	O
on	O	O
a	O	O
test	O	O
class	O	O
.	O	O

@ActiveProfiles	B-Code_Block	B-Class
is	O	O
used	O	O
to	O	O
designate	O	O
which	O	O
bean	O	O
definition	O	O
profiles	O	O
(	O	O
e.g	O	O
.	O	O
,	O	O
those	O	O
declared	O	O
via	O	O
@Profile	B-Code_Block	B-Class
)	O	O
should	O	O
be	O	O
active	O	B-Value
when	O	O
loading	O	O
an	O	O
ApplicationContext	B-Code_Block	B-Class
for	O	O
an	O	O
integration	O	O
test	O	O
.	O	O

@IfProfileValue	B-Code_Block	B-Class
does	O	O
not	O	O
allow	O	O
you	O	O
to	O	O
check	O	O
things	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
Spring	O	B-Class
Environment	B-Code_Block	I-Class
.	O	O

I	O	O
'm	O	O
not	O	O
sure	O	O
why	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O
assuming	O	O
this	O	O
,	O	O
since	O	O
none	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
documentation	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
Spring	O	B-Library
Framework	O	I-Library
states	O	O
that	O	O
.	O	O

As	O	O
I	O	O
stated	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
aforementioned	O	O
thread	O	O
:	O	O

Please	O	O
note	O	O
that	O	O
@IfProfileValue	B-Code_Block	B-Class
was	O	O
introduced	O	O
in	O	O
Spring	O	B-Library
Framework	O	I-Library
2.0	O	B-Version
,	O	O
long	O	O
before	O	O
the	O	O
notion	O	O
of	O	O
bean	O	O
definition	O	O
profiles	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
@ActiveProfiles	B-Code_Block	B-Class
was	O	O
first	O	O
introduced	O	O
in	O	O
Spring	O	B-Library
Framework	O	I-Library
3.1	O	B-Version
.	O	O

In	O	O
the	O	O
aforementioned	O	O
thread	O	O
,	O	O
I	O	O
also	O	O
pointed	O	O
out	O	O
the	O	O

The	O	O
term	O	O
'	O	O
profile	O	B-Variable
'	O	O
is	O	O
perhaps	O	O
misleading	O	O
when	O	O

the	O	O
semantics	O	O
for	O	O
@IfProfileValue	B-Code_Block	B-Class
.	O	O

The	O	O
key	O	O
is	O	O
to	O	O
think	O	O
about	O	O
'	O	O
test	O	O
groups	O	O
'	O	O
(	O	O
like	O	O
those	O	O
in	O	O
TestNG	O	B-Library
)	O	O
instead	O	O
of	O	O
'	O	O
profiles	O	B-Variable
'	O	O
.	O	O

See	O	O
the	O	O
examples	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
JavaDoc	O	O
for	O	O
@IfProfileValue	O	B-Class
.	O	O

That	O	O
depends	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
..	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
'm	O	O
assuming	O	O
you	O	O
mean	O	O
bean	O	O
definition	O	O
profile	O	B-Variable
when	O	O
you	O	O
say	O	O
"	O	O
profile	O	B-Variable
"	O	O
.	O	O

If	O	O
you	O	O
're	O	O
using	O	O
@ActiveProfiles	B-Code_Block	B-Class
to	O	O
set	O	O
the	O	O
bean	O	O
definition	O	O
profiles	O	O
for	O	O
your	O	O
tests	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
cannot	O	O
currently	O	O
use	O	O
@IfProfileValue	B-Code_Block	B-Class
to	O	O
determine	O	O
if	O	O
a	O	O
bean	O	O
definition	O	O
profile	O	B-Class
is	O	O
active	O	B-Value
,	O	O
since	O	O
the	O	O
bean	O	O
definition	O	O
profiles	O	B-Variable
configured	O	O
via	O	O
@ActiveProfiles	B-Code_Block	B-Class
are	O	O
set	O	O
directly	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
test	O	O
's	O	O
ApplicationContext	B-Code_Block	B-Class
and	O	O
not	O	O
as	O	O
a	O	O
Java	O	B-Language
system	O	O
property	O	O
.	O	O

However	O	O
,	O	O
if	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O
setting	O	O
the	O	O
bean	O	O
definition	O	O
profiles	O	O
only	O	O
via	O	O
the	O	O
spring.profiles.active	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
system	O	O
property	O	O
,	O	O
then	O	O
it	O	O
would	O	O
be	O	O
possible	O	O
to	O	O
use	O	O
@IfProfileValue	B-Code_Block	B-Class
to	O	O
determine	O	O
if	O	O
a	O	O
bean	O	O
definition	O	O
profile	O	B-Variable
is	O	O
active	O	B-Value
,	O	O
since	O	O
@IfProfileValue	B-Code_Block	B-Class
in	O	O
fact	O	O
works	O	O
with	O	O
system	O	O
properties	O	O
.	O	O

For	O	O
example	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
could	O	O
then	O	O
use	O	O
the	O	O
following	O	O
:	O	O

That	O	O
wo	O	O
n't	O	O
work	O	O
since	O	O
activeProfiles	B-Code_Block	B-Value
is	O	O
the	O	O
incorrect	O	O
property	O	O
name	O	B-Variable
.	O	O

The	O	O
correct	O	O
system	O	O
property	O	O
name	O	O
is	O	O
spring.profiles.active	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
.	O	O

See	O	O
AbstractEnvironment.ACTIVE_PROFILES_PROPERTY_NAME	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
for	O	O
details	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
fact	O	O
that	O	O
@IfProfileValue	B-Code_Block	B-Class
does	O	O
not	O	O
work	O	O
in	O	O
harmony	O	O
with	O	O
@ActiveProfiles	B-Code_Block	B-Class
is	O	O
a	O	O
known	O	O
issue	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
Spring	O	B-Library
team	O	O
.	O	O

Please	O	O
consult	O	O
the	O	O
following	O	O
JIRA	O	B-Application
issues	O	O
for	O	O
further	O	O
details	O	O
and	O	O
to	O	O
join	O	O
in	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
discussions	O	O
if	O	O
you	O	O
'd	O	O
like	O	O

https://jira.spring.io/browse/SPR-7754	O	O

https://jira.spring.io/browse/SPR-8982	O	O

https://jira.spring.io/browse/SPR-11677	O	O

Hope	O	O
this	O	O
clarifies	O	O
the	O	O
situation	O	O
for	O	O
you	O	O

Sam	O	B-User_Name
(	O	O
author	O	O
of	O	O

'm	O	O
using	O	O
strings	O	B-Data_Type
for	O	O
both	O	O
start	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
and	O	O

,	O	O
but	O	O
due	O	O
to	O	O
+	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
being	O	O

,	O	O
that	O	O
does	O	O

make	O	O
any	O	O
difference	O	O
here	O	O

(	O	O

start	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
were	O	O
an	O	O

,	O	O
the	O	O
first	O	O

,	O	O
the	O	O
extra	O	O
+	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
ends	O	O
up	O	O
being	O	O
a	O	O
unary	O	B-Data_Type
+	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
operator	O	O
with	O	O
'	B-Code_Block	B-Value
\t	I-Code_Block	I-Value
'	B-Code_Block	B-Value
as	O	O
the	O	O
operand	O	O
.	O	O

Unary	O	O
numeric	O	O
promotion	O	O
is	O	O
applied	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
char	B-Code_Block	B-Data_Type
,	O	O

as	O	O
a	O	O

So	O	O
the	O	O
code	O	O
becomes	O	O
effectively	O	O
:	O	O

which	O	O
is	O	O
effectively	O	O
:	O	O

which	O	O
is	O	O
effectively	O	O

..	O	O
.	O	O
at	O	O
which	O	O
point	O	O

hopefully	O	O

why	O	O

getting	O	O
the	O	O
output	O	O

are	O	O
.	O	O

To	O	O
avoid	O	O
accidentally	O	O

a	O	O

as	O	O

no	O	O

+	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block

for	O	O

:	O	O

.	O	O
.	O	O
gives	O	O
:	O	O

The	O	O
problem	O	O
is	O	O
not	O	O
just	O	O
with	O	O

+	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
in	O	O
your	O	O

But	O	O
it	O	O

with	O	O

that	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O
using	O	O
char	O	B-Data_Type
'	B-Code_Block	B-Value
\t	I-Code_Block	I-Value
'	B-Code_Block	B-Value
and	O	O
not	O	O
String	O	B-Data_Type
"	B-Code_Block	B-Value
\t	I-Code_Block	I-Value
"	B-Code_Block	B-Value
.	O	O

So	O	O
when	O	O
you	O	O
use	O	O
System.out.println	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
(	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
"	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
Hello	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
"	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
+	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
'	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
\t'	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
)	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block

\t	B-Code_Block	B-Value
.	O	O

But	O	O
when	O	O
you	O	O

(	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
"	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block

"	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
+	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
+	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block

\t'	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block

,	O	O
it	O	O
becomes	O	O
effectively	O	O
System.out.println	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
(	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
"	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
Hello	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
"	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
+	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
(	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
+	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
'	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
\t'	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
)	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block

.	O	O

So	O	O

is	O	O

as	O	O
an	O	O

by	O	O
java	O	B-Language
.	O	O

You	O	O
only	O	O
assign	O	O
+	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
and	O	O
-	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
signs	O	O
to	O	O

not	O	O

.	O	O

Remember	O	O

do	O	O

=	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
+2	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
or	O	O
-2	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
or	O	O
+	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
+	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
2	I-Code_Block	I-Code_Block
.	O	O

And	O	O
the	O	O
ASCII	O	O
value	O	O
of	O	O
\t	B-Code_Block	B-Value
is	O	O

.	O	O

a	O	O

that	O	O

the	O	O
one	O	O
a	O	O

on	O	O

10	O	B-Version
has	O	O

this	O	O
because	O	O

looks	O	O

looks	O	O

.	O	O

that	O	O

So	O	O

.	O	O

.	O	O

What	O	O
is	O	O
wrong	O	O
?	O	O

The	O	O
description	O	O
of	O	O

is	O	O
"	O	O

itself	O	O
.	O	O

So	O	O

it	O	O
like	O	O
the	O	O
following	O	O
.	O	O

works	O	O

,	O	O
probably	O	O
because	O	O
it	O	O

actually	O	O
two	O	O
controls	O	O
,	O	O
not	O	O
one	O	O
as	O	O
the	O	O
native	O	O
border	O	B-User_Interface_Element
is	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
get	O	O
following	O	O
error	O	O

when	O	O

try	O	O
to	O	O

specific	O	O
entities	O	O
to	O	O
my	O	O
JSP	O	B-Application
form	O	O
.	O	O

occurs	O	O
when	O	O

to	O	O

which	O	O
types	O	O
are	O	O
"	O	O

"	O	O
.	O	O

error	O	O

:	O	O

to	O	O

lies	O	O
in	O	O
at	B-Code_Block	B-Output_Block

and	O	O
at	B-Code_Block	B-Output_Block
org.apache.jsp.admin.ManageUsers_jsp._jspService(ManageUsers_jsp.java:133)	I-Code_Block	I-Output_Block
.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
checked	O	O
those	O	O
codes	O	O
in	O	O
those	O	O
specific	O	O

and	O	O

now	O	O

for	O	O

of	O	O

is	O	O

:	O	O

for	O	O

is	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O

and	O	O

a	O	O

the	O	O
3	O	O
applications	O	O
,	O	O
let	O	O
's	O	O
call	O	O
it	O	O
A	O	B-Variable
.	O	O

This	O	O
renders	O	O
data	O	O
exchange	O	O
with	O	O
A	O	B-Variable
trivial	O	O
.	O	O

In	O	O
order	O	O
to	O	O
allow	O	O
for	O	O
a	O	O
bidirectional	O	O
data	O	O
exchange	O	O
with	O	O
applications	O	O
B	O	B-Variable
and	O	O

(	O	O

some	O	O

into	O	O
A	O	O

,	O	O

states	O	O

onto	O	O
more	O	O

mapping	O	O
.	O	O

want	O	O
to	O	O
change	O	O

approach	O	O

(	O	O

of	O	O

simply	O	O

B	O	O

that	O	O

.	O	O

Example	O	O
using	O	O
PHP	O	B-Language

The	O	O
following	O	O
code	O	O
is	O	O
an	O	O
example	O	O
in	O	O
PHP	O	B-Language
retrieving	O	O

(	O	O

)	O	O

into	O	O
an	O	O
array	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

From	O	O
what	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O

like	O	O

to	O	O

results	O	O
.	O	O

If	O	O
this	O	O
is	O	O
the	O	O
case	O	O
,	O	O
do	O	O
you	O	O
know	O	O

are	O	O
any	O	O
indexes	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
database	O	O
being	O	O
queried	O	O
?	O	O

If	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O

data	O	O
across	O	O
multiple	O	O
linked	O	O
tables	O	B-User_Interface_Element
(	O	O
which	O	O
it	O	O
looks	O	O
&	O	O
sounds	O	O
like	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O
)	O	O
,	O	O

will	O	O

.	O	O

This	O	O
website	O	O

a	O	O

to	O	O
indexes	O	O
that	O	O

a	O	O

at	O	O
.	O	O

than	O	O
this	O	O

to	O	O

a	O	O

to	O	O

process	O	O
for	O	O
you	O	O
like	O	O
Anusha	O	B-User_Name
has	O	O
described	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
comments	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
would	O	O
recommend	O	O

into	O	O

as	O	O

as	O	O

up	O	O

jobs	O	O
,	O	O

than	O	O
just	O	O
cut	O	O
down	O	O

of	O	O

takes	O	O
for	O	O
you	O	O
to	O	O
generate	O	O
the	O	O
data	O	O
each	O	O
month	O	O
,	O	O
you	O	O
could	O	O
fully	O	O
automate	O	O
it	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
have	O	O
it	O	O
running	O	O
in	O	O
a	O	O
few	O	O
minutes	O	O
,	O	O
rather	O	O
than	O	O
hours	O	O
each	O	O
month	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
an	O	O
EF	O	B-Library
model	O	O
where	O	O
I	O	O
logically	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
"	O	O
template	O	B-Class
"	O	O
type	O	O
and	O	O
an	O	O
"	O	O
instance	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
template	O	O
type	O	O
"	O	O

Basically	O	O
my	O	O
templates	O	B-Class
are	O	O
like	O	O
a	O	O
work	O	O
flow	O	O
and	O	O
the	O	O
instances	O	O
are	O	O
those	O	O
templates	O	B-Class
applied	O	O
to	O	O
an	O	O
object	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
association	O	O
is	O	O
that	O	O
a	O	O
template	O	B-Class
has	O	O
zero	O	O
to	O	O
many	O	O
instances	O	O
,	O	O
an	O	O
instance	O	O
is	O	O
always	O	O
based	O	O
on	O	O
a	O	O
template	O	B-Class
.	O	O

For	O	O
example	O	O
the	O	O
template	O	B-Class
may	O	O
be	O	O
"	O	O
send	O	O
letter	O	O
"	O	O
which	O	O
gets	O	O
applied	O	O
to	O	O
a	O	O
customer	O	O
to	O	O
create	O	O
an	O	O
instance	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
letter	O	O
sent	O	O
,	O	O
which	O	O
includes	O	O
the	O	O
date	O	O
sent	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
pdf	O	B-File_Type
of	O	O
the	O	O
letter	O	O
etc	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
templates	O	B-Class
have	O	O
a	O	O
few	O	O
subclasses/types	O	O
which	O	O
will	O	O
always	O	O
match	O	O
an	O	O
instance	O	O
which	O	O
also	O	O
has	O	O
a	O	O
corresponding	O	O
subclass	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
issue	O	O
is	O	O
how	O	O
can	O	O
I	O	O
ensure	O	O
that	O	O
when	O	O
I	O	O
create	O	O
an	O	O
instance	O	O
(	O	O
which	O	O
will	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
reference	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
template	O	O
)	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
instance	O	O
is	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
correct	O	O
inherited	O	O
type	O	O
.	O	O

For	O	O
example	O	O
if	O	O
the	O	O
template	O	O
is	O	O
of	O	O
type	O	O
TemplateType2	O	B-Class
(	O	O
inherits	O	O
from	O	O
template	O	B-Class
)	O	O
and	O	O
I	O	O
add	O	O
an	O	O
instance	O	O
to	O	O
loan1	O	B-Variable
.	O	O
.	O	O
loan1.TemplateInstances.add(foo)	O	B-Function
…	O	O
I	O	O
want	O	O
to	O	O
ensure	O	O
that	O	O
foo	O	B-Variable
is	O	O
of	O	O
type	O	O
InstanceType2	O	B-Class
.	O	O

The	O	O
way	O	O
I	O	O
am	O	O
doing	O	O
it	O	O
now	O	O
seems	O	O
like	O	O
such	O	O
a	O	O

.	O	O

I	O	O
am	O	O
storing	O	O
the	O	O
instance	O	O
entity	O	O

as	O	O
a	O	O
scalar	O	O

in	O	O
the	O	O
template	O	B-Class
entity	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
using	O	O
reflection	O	O
to	O	O
create	O	O
the	O	O
correct	O	O
type	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O

.	O	O

It	O	O
works	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O

is	O	O
basically	O	O
using	O	O
the	O	O
value	O	O
of	O	O
a	O	O
property	O	O
to	O	O
do	O	O
mapping	O	O
,	O	O
exposing	O	O
the	O	O
possibility	O	O
of	O	O
all	O	O

of	O	O
errors	O	O
if	O	O
they	O	O
do	O	O
not	O	O
match	O	O
the	O	O
name	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
instance	O	O
name	O	O
,	O	O

worse	O	O
if	O	O
they	O	O
enter	O	O
the	O	O
wrong	O	O
entity	O	O
name	O	O
.	O	O

Any	O	O
ideas	O	O
or	O	O
thoughts	O	O
how	O	O
to	O	O
tackle	O	O
this	O	O
issue	O	O
?	O	O

I	O	O
ended	O	O
up	O	O
solving	O	O
this	O	O
through	O	O
a	O	O
bit	O	O
of	O	O
a	O	O

.	O	O

I	O	O
used	O	O
naming	O	O
conventions	O	O
and	O	O
adding	O	O
my	O	O
own	O	O
handler	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
context	O	O
savingchanges	O	B-Function
method	O	O

and	O	O
then	O	O
a	O	O
bit	O	O
of	O	O

.	O	O

Not	O	O
the	O	O
best	O	O
solution	O	O
but	O	O
it	O	O
works	O	O
.	O	O

the	O	O
main	O	O
part	O	O
..	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
'm	O	O
trying	O	O
to	O	O
parse	O	O
a	O	O
string	O	B-Data_Type
with	O	O
parentheses	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
form	O	O
((Question)(Left_Node)(right_node))	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
.	O	O

The	O	O
question	O	O
for	O	O
example	O	O
will	O	O
be	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
form	O	O
"	O	O
if	O	O
segment	O	O
size	O	O
<	O	O
1.5	O	B-Value
,	O	O
then	O	O
choose	O	O
left	O	O
node	O	O
,	O	O
else	O	O
right	O	O
"	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
question	O	O
can	O	O
be	O	O
a	O	O
dictionary	O	B-Data_Structure
with	O	O
a	O	O
key	O	B-Variable
and	O	O
a	O	O
value	O	B-Variable
.	O	O

The	O	O
left	O	O
and	O	O
right	O	O
node	O	B-Data_Structure
represent	O	O
a	O	O
complete	O	O
left	O	O
or	O	O
right	O	O
half	O	O
tree	O	B-Data_Structure
,	O	O
which	O	O
will	O	O
be	O	O
traversed	O	O
recursively	O	O
until	O	O
the	O	O
leaf	O	O
node	O	B-Data_Structure
is	O	O
reached	O	O
.	O	O

In	O	O
this	O	O
manner	O	O
we	O	O
will	O	O
build	O	O
a	O	O
binary	O	O
decision	O	O
tree	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

If	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
decide	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
details	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
input	O	O
format	O	O
,	O	O
then	O	O
use	O	O
raw	O	O
python	O	B-Language
source	O	O
code	O	O
.	O	O

For	O	O
example	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
store	O	O
your	O	O
tree	O	B-Data_Structure
in	O	O
a	O	O
python	O	B-Language
dictionary	O	B-Data_Structure
of	O	O
nodes	O	B-Data_Structure
:	O	O

Now	O	O
you	O	O
can	O	O
parse	O	O
this	O	O
tree	O	B-Data_Structure
simply	O	O
with	O	O
the	O	O
python	O	B-Language
parser	O	O
.	O	O

Well	O	O
,	O	O
if	O	O
the	O	O
input	O	O
format	O	O
is	O	O
already	O	O
specified	O	O
,	O	O
then	O	O
we	O	O
cannot	O	O
help	O	O
you	O	O
if	O	O
you	O	O
do	O	O
n't	O	O
share	O	O
the	O	O
details	O	O
of	O	O
that	O	O
format	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
kind	O	O
of	O	O
syntax	O	O
is	O	O
really	O	O
the	O	O
target	O	O
for	O	O
pyparsing	O	B-Library
.	O	O

The	O	O
basic	O	O
format	O	O
is	O	O
simple	O	O
enough	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
in	O	O
pyparsing	O	B-Library
,	O	O
it	O	O
looks	O	O
like	O	O
:	O	O

But	O	O
once	O	O
you	O	O
start	O	O
to	O	O
add	O	O
arithmetic	O	O
expressions	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
boolean	O	O
operations	O	O
and	O	O
support	O	O
for	O	O
'	O	O
and	O	B-Code_Block
'	O	O
and	O	O
'	O	O
or	O	B-Code_Block
'	O	O
operators	O	O
,	O	O
things	O	O
get	O	O
complicated	O	O
.	O	O

Also	O	O
,	O	O
this	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
recursive	O	O
grammar	O	O
,	O	O
since	O	O
an	O	O
action	O	O
can	O	O
itself	O	O
be	O	O
a	O	O
nested	O	O
decision	O	O
.	O	O

Pyparsing	O	B-Library
has	O	O
built-in	O	O
support	O	O
that	O	O
simplifies	O	O
definition	O	O
of	O	O
arithmetic	O	O
and	O	O
boolean	O	B-Data_Type
expressions	O	O
,	O	O
including	O	O
precedence	O	O
of	O	O
operations	O	O
and	O	O
gruping	O	O
in	O	O
parentheses	O	O
,	O	O
plus	O	O
recursive	O	O
expressions	O	O
.	O	O

Here	O	O
is	O	O
the	O	O
pyparsing	O	B-Library
grammar	O	O
in	O	O
various	O	O
pieces	O	O
.	O	O

First	O	O
here	O	O
are	O	O
some	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
basic	O	O
parsing	O	O
elements	O	O
:	O	O

The	O	O
parse	O	O
action	O	O
attached	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
number	O	O
expression	O	O
will	O	O
automatically	O	O
convert	O	O
the	O	O
parsed	O	O
number	O	O
to	O	O
a	O	O
float	O	B-Data_Type
value	O	O
at	O	O
parse	O	O
time	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
Word	O	B-Class
class	O	O
takes	O	O
two	O	O
strings	O	B-Data_Type
:	O	O
a	O	O
string	O	B-Data_Type
containing	O	O
all	O	O
valid	O	O
leading	O	O
characters	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
a	O	O
string	O	B-Data_Type
of	O	O
all	O	O
valid	O	O
body	O	O
characters	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
varname	O	B-Variable
definition	O	O
supports	O	O
variable	O	O
names	O	O
similar	O	O
to	O	O
Python	O	B-Language
identifiers	O	O
.	O	O

Pyparsing	O	B-Library
has	O	O
the	O	O
operatorPrecedence	B-Code_Block	B-Function
method	O	O
that	O	O
takes	O	O
an	O	O
expression	O	O
for	O	O
the	O	O
basic	O	O
operand	O	O
definition	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
a	O	O

of	O	O
tuples	O	O
to	O	O
define	O	O
each	O	O
level	O	O
of	O	O
operators	O	O
:	O	O
an	O	O
expression	O	O
for	O	O
the	O	O
operators	O	O
,	O	O
an	O	O
integer	O	B-Data_Type
whether	O	O
the	O	O
operator	O	O
is	O	O
unary	O	O
,	O	O
binary	O	O
,	O	O
or	O	O
ternary	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
whether	O	O
left	O	O
-	O	O
or	O	O
right-associative	O	O
.	O	O

operatorPrecedence	O	O
takes	O	O
care	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
recursive	O	O
definition	O	O
of	O	O
arithmetic	O	O
expressions	O	O
nested	O	O
in	O	O
parentheses	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
expression	O	O
defines	O	O
basic	O	O
4-function	O	O
math	O	O
:	O	O

Now	O	O
here	O	O
is	O	O
the	O	O
definition	O	O
of	O	O
a	O	O
boolean	O	O
condition	O	O
(	O	O
which	O	O
we	O	O
'll	O	O
eventually	O	O
use	O	O
to	O	O
define	O	O
the	O	O
decision	O	O
question	O	O
)	O	O
:	O	O

Your	O	O
definition	O	O
of	O	O
actions	O	O
was	O	O
a	O	O
little	O	O
sketchy	O	O
,	O	O
so	O	O
I	O	O
made	O	O
up	O	O
some	O	O
possible	O	O
statements	O	O
:	O	O
an	O	O
assignment	O	O
statement	O	O
,	O	O
a	O	O
print	B-Code_Block	O
statement	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
since	O	O
this	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
speech	O	O
application	O	O
,	O	O
a	O	O
say	B-Code_Block	O
statement	O	O
which	O	O
is	O	O
very	O	O
simliar	O	O
to	O	O
print	B-Code_Block	O
.	O	O

In	O	O
addition	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
expression	O	O

,	O	O
you	O	O
'll	O	O

that	O	O

by	O	O
a	O	O

string	O	B-Data_Type
,	O	O
as	O	O
if	O	O
the	O	O
expression	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
function	O	O
being	O	O
called	O	O
with	O	O
that	O	O
string	O	B-Data_Type
.	O	O

In	O	O
fact	O	O
,	O	O
this	O	O
"	O	O
call	O	B-Function
"	O	O
actually	O	O
returns	O	O

the	O	O

,	O	O
and	O	O
the	O	O

are	O	O

with	O	O
that	O	O
name	O	O
.	O	O

These	O	O
results	O	O

are	O	O
very	O	O
helpful	O	O
at	O	O
post-parsing	O	O
time	O	O
at	O	O
picking	O	O
out	O	O
the	O	O
individual	O	O
matching	O	O
elements	O	O
(	O	O
similar	O	O
to	O	O
named	O	O
groups	O	O
in	O	O
regular	O	O
expressions	O	O
)	O	O
.	O	O

Finally	O	O
,	O	O
to	O	O
put	O	O
these	O	O

together	O	O
into	O	O
your	O	O
decision	O	O
expression	O	O
,	O	O
here	O	O
are	O	O
the	O	O
question	O	O
and	O	O
action	O	O
expressions	O	O
:	O	O

Note	O	O
that	O	O
the	O	O
action	O	O
definition	O	O
can	O	O
include	O	O
a	O	O
decision	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
action	O	O
is	O	O
used	O	O
to	O	O
define	O	O
decision	O	O
.	O	O

break	O	O

preface	O	O
this	O	O
section	O	O
with	O	O
defining	O	O
decision	B-Code_Block	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
with	O	O
a	O	O
placeholder	O	O
expression	O	O
using	O	O
the	O	O
pyparsing	O	B-Library
Forward	B-Code_Block	B-Class
class	O	O
:	O	O

Then	O	O
after	O	O
question	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
and	O	O
action	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
are	O	O
defined	O	O
,	O	O
we	O	O
use	O	O
the	O	O
'	O	O
<<	O	B-Code_Block
'	O	O
operator	O	O
to	O	O
"	O	O
insert	O	O
"	O	O
the	O	O
actual	O	O
expression	O	O
definition	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
existing	O	O
decision	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
variable	O	O
:	O	O

Again	O	O
,	O	O
I	O	O
took	O	O
liberties	O	O
with	O	O
your	O	O
defined	O	O
format	O	O
,	O	O

that	O	O
an	O	O

.	O	O

If	O	O

Optional	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block

around	O	O

Group(action)("elseAction")	B-Code_Block	B-Code_Block
.	O	O

That	O	O
defines	O	O

grammar	O	O
,	O	O
now	O	O
here	O	O
are	O	O
some	O	O

.	O	O

Using	O	O
dump()	O	B-Function
on	O	O

results	O	O

by	O	O
parseString	O	B-Function
is	O	O

tokens	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O

attached	O	O

.	O	O

Here	O	O
's	O	O
the	O	O
output	O	O
:	O	O

Here	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
link	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
full	O	O
parsing	O	O
program	O	O
-	O	O
http://pastebin.com/DnaNrx7j	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
is	O	O
just	O	O
the	O	O
first	O	O
stage	O	O
,	O	O
parsing	O	O
the	O	O
input	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
next	O	O
step	O	O
is	O	O
actually	O	O

the	O	O
expression	O	O
by	O	O

.	O	O

The	O	O
pyparsing	O	B-Library
wiki	O	O
example	O	O
SimpleBool.py	O	B-File_Name
(	O	O
http://pyparsing.wikispaces.com/file/view/simpleBool.py	O	O
)	O	O
includes	O	O
an	O	O
example	O	O
of	O	O
attaching	O	O
parse	O	O
actions	O	O
to	O	O
convert	O	O
parsed	O	O
tokens	O	O
into	O	O
callable	O	O
class	O	O
instances	O	O
that	O	O
simplify	O	O
evaluating	O	O
the	O	O
results	O	O
.	O	O

Hope	O	O
this	O	O
helps	O	O
.	O	O

I	O	O
have	O	O
noticed	O	O
people	O	O
use	O	O
this	O	O
code	O	O
to	O	O
localize	O	O

Could	O	O
anyone	O	O
tell	O	O
me	O	O
what	O	O
CurrentUICulture	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
and	O	O
CurrentCulture	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
are	O	O
?	O	O

Why	O	O
do	O	O
we	O	O
need	O	O
to	O	O
assign	O	O
same	O	O
value	O	O
to	O	O
both	O	O

What	O	O
will	O	O
happen	O	O
if	O	O
I	O	O
assign	O	O
the	O	O
value	O	O
CultureInfo("fr-FR")	B-Code_Block	B-Value
;	O	O
to	O	O
only	O	O
CurrentUICulture	O	B-Variable
or	O	O
CurrentCulture	O	B-Variable
?	O	O

I	O	O
would	O	O
really	O	O
like	O	O
to	O	O
know	O	O
in	O	O
detail	O	O
what	O	O
CurrentUICulture	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
and	O	O
CurrentCulture	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
does	O	O
?	O	O

.	O	O

What	O	O

code	O	O
coverage	O	O

?	O	O

are	O	O

.	O	O

.	O	O

value	O	O
a	O	O
valid	O	O

?	O	O

have	O	O

(	O	O
old	O	O

(	O	O

)	O	O
.	O	O

option	O	O
.	O	O

You	O	O
can	O	O
make	O	O
it	O	O
detect	O	O
Mac	O	B-Device
as	O	O
well	O	O
via	O	O

The	O	O
first	O	O
problem	O	O

to	O	O
line	O	O
breaks	O	O

.	O	O

using	O	O

instead	O	O
.	O	O

of	O	O
\n	B-Code_Block	B-Value
,	O	O

.	O	O

I	O	O
am	O	O
using	O	O
CE	O	B-Application
6.5.17	O	B-Version

The	O	O
easiest	O	O

.	O	O

Then	O	O
the	O	O

"	O	O

from	O	O

.	O	O

https://github.com/Crinsane/LaravelShoppingcart	O	O

A	O	O
CaseMilestone	O	B-Class
record	O	O
can	O	O
have	O	O
one	O	O
Case	O	B-Class
record	O	O

records	O	O
.	O	O

works	O	O
:	O	O

,	O	O

following	O	O
does	O	O

work	O	O
:	O	O

How	O	O
come	O	O
?	O	O

If	O	O
it	O	O
is	O	O
because	O	O
not	O	O

are	O	O
required	O	O
to	O	O
have	O	O
an	O	O
associated	O	O

,	O	O
which	O	O
query	O	O
will	O	O
get	O	O
me	O	O
what	O	O
I	O	O
'm	O	O
looking	O	O

I	O	O
am	O	O
using	O	O
255	B-Code_Block	B-Value

for	O	I-Value

.	O	O

is	O	O
that	O	O

First	O	O

believe	O	O
you	O	O
mean	O	O

does	O	O

.	O	O

Assuming	O	O
you	O	O
are	O	O
driving	O	O
a	O	O
DC	O	B-Device
motor	O	I-Device
,	O	O
and	O	O
not	O	O
something	O	O
like	O	O
a	O	O

stepper	O	B-Device

have	O	O
two	O	O
problems	O	O
.	O	O

1st	O	O
.	O	O

you	O	O
may	O	O
need	O	O
a	O	O
smoothing	O	O
capacitor	O	O
.	O	O

Where	O	O
your	O	O
formula	O	O
would	O	O
be	O	O
F	O	B-Code_Block
=	O	I-Code_Block
L*C	O	I-Code_Block
Noting	O	O
that	O	O
analogWrite	O	B-Function
uses	O	O
a	O	O
F	O	B-Code_Block
=	O	I-Code_Block
490Hz	O	I-Code_Block
.	O	O

The	O	O
concept	O	O
is	O	O
simple	O	O
,	O	O
in	O	O
short	O	O
the	O	O
cap	O	O
average	O	O
out	O	O

high	O	O
and	O	O

of	O	O
the	O	O
PWM	O	O

based	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
duty	O	O
cycle	O	O
.	O	O

And	O	O
the	O	O
capacitance	O	O
needed	O	O
is	O	O
based	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
frequency	O	O
and	O	O
impedance	O	O
.	O	O

This	O	O
will	O	O
provide	O	O
the	O	O
analog	O	O
voltage	O	O
.	O	O

2nd	O	O
.	O	O

bigger	O	O
problem	O	O
is	O	O
the	O	O
output	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
Arduino	O	B-Device
can	O	O
not	O	O
supply	O	O
sufficient	O	O

to	O	O
drive	O	O

motor	O	B-Device

.	O	O

will	O	O
max	O	O
out	O	O
at	O	O
about	O	O
20ma	O	B-Value
,	O	O
and	O	O

motor	O	B-Device

more	O	O
.	O	O

So	O	O
at	O	O
low	O	O
speeds	O	O

pulses	O	O
which	O	O
were	O	O
week	O	O

should	O	O

the	O	O
cap	O	O
.	O	O

see	O	O
adafruit-arduino-lesson-13-dc-motors/breadboard	O	O

Anytime	O	O

.	O	O

.	O	O

.	O	O

deployment	O	O
target	O	O
.	O	O

Unfortunately	O	O
,	O	O
that	O	O
wo	O	O
n't	O	O
necessarily	O	O

warnings	O	O
for	O	O

Apple	O	B-Library

was	O	O

Thanks	O	O

Sabari	O	B-User_Name

The	O	O
MONGOHQ_URL	B-Code_Block	B-Variable
in	O	O
your	O	O
code	O	O
snippet	O	O
comes	O	O
from	O	O

shell	O	B-Application

?	O	O

Example	O	O
code	O	O
:	O	O

plot	O	B-User_Interface_Element
:	O	O

would	O	O

lighter	O	O

,	O	O

pick	O	O

.	O	O

would	O	O

faster	O	O
.	O	O

.	O	O

.	O	O

Queues	O	B-Data_Structure
.	O	O

.	O	O

I	O	O
dont	O	O

best	O	O
.	O	O

My	O	O
app	O	O
will	O	O
have	O	O
various	O	O
quests	O	O
(	O	O
hosted	O	O

a	O	O

)	O	O
that	O	O

it	O	O
now	O	O
.	O	O

How	O	O
can	O	O
i	O	O
achieve	O	O
that	O	O
?	O	O

I	O	O
searched	O	O
the	O	O
web	O	O
and	O	O
i	O	O
cant	O	O
find	O	O
anything	O	O
that	O	O
suits	O	O
my	O	O
needs	O	O
.	O	O

store	O	O
a	O	O
timestamp	O	B-Class
on	O	O
the	O	O
users	O	O
phone	O	O
.	O	O

.	O	O

timestamp	O	B-Class
.	O	O

use	O	O
this	O	O

I	O	O
would	O	O
like	O	O
a	O	O
notepad++	O	B-Application
regex	O	O
to	O	O
replace	O	O

into	O	O

may	O	O
also	O	O

three	O	O
or	O	O
for	O	O

in	O	O
each	O	O
line	O	O

this	O	O

.	O	O

i	O	O

so	O	O
far	O	O
is	O	O

a	O	O

expression	O	O
